summary: You can keep a daily record of micturitions and export them to PDF.
comments: Exactly what I was looking for. I'm a cancer patient and I needed to track both my water intake and my urine in a calendar view. Idk yet if i can backup my data but so far I'm really pleased. Thank you.

title: Kegel Exercises Master
description:
The Kegel Exercise (also referred to as the Pelvic Floor Exercise) is the action of repetitive contraction of the pubococcygeus (P.C.) muscles. If you‚Äôve ever stopped yourself from urinating midstream, you‚Äôve used your PC muscles. If you flex your PC muscles and hold them in a contracted position for ten seconds through a series of reps you are then partaking in the Kegel exercise. Originally used for women to control incontinence (the urge to urinate all the time) and to enhance sexual responses during intercourse, the Kegel Exercise is now also being used by men.

How to do Kegel Exercises
Locate the right muscles
Insert a finger inside your anus and squeeze the surrounding muscles. You can feel the PC muscle tighten or move upward when you contract it. Then, relax your muscles and feel your pelvic floor return to the starting position.

Also try to stop the flow of urine when you urinate. Don‚Äôt do this on an extremely full bladder.
Practice Makes Perfect
Contract your pelvic floor muscles, hold the contraction for five seconds, and then relax for five seconds. Practice it five to six times in a row. Work up to keeping the muscles contracted for ten seconds at a time, and then relax for another ten seconds between each contraction.
Focus While Exercising
To have a faster result in a shorter period of time, focus your mind on tightening your pelvic floor muscles only. Do not flex the muscles in your abdomen, thighs or buttocks. Breathe normally and avoid holding your breath.
Repeat 3 times a day
Practice at least three sets of ten repetitions a day. After a while, you‚Äôll be able to exercise your PC muscles seamlessly. You‚Äôll even be able to do them while doing your daily chores!
The Kegel exercise has been shown to promote vast improvement in the health of the penis. In excess, however, the exercise can also be very harmful. The reason for this is because over-contraction of the prostate muscle triggers the prostate's sympathetic nerve to induce an ejaculation. Never perform the Kegel with an extremely full bladder. Overworking the PC muscle for a long period of time would weaken it and result in premature ejaculation or seminal leakage.
 
People with weak prostates or exhausted prostate should be taking prostate care formula with Kegel to have a better ejaculation control results. Weakened bladders can be strengthened with herbs for bladder, which improves bladder elasticity.

title: Bladder Infections Home Remedy
description:
A urinary tract infection (UTI) is an infection that affects part of the urinary tract. When it affects the lower urinary tract it is known as a bladder infection (cystitis) and when it affects the upper urinary tract it is known as kidney infection (pyelonephritis). Symptoms from a lower urinary tract include pain with urination, frequent urination, and feeling the need to urinate despite having an empty bladder. Symptoms of a kidney infection include fever and flank pain usually in addition to the symptoms of a lower UTI. Rarely the urine may appear bloody. In the very old and the very young, symptoms may be vague or non-specific.
Bladder Irritants
Uti Treatment Over The Counter
Uti Treatment Without Antibiotics
Painful Bladder Syndrome

How To Get Rid Of A Uti In 24 Hours

How Long Does A Uti Last

title: Toilet Tracker
description:
Toilet Tracker is a lifestyle management and statistical analysis program for the Google Android operating system.

What Toilet Tracker does:
* Record details about toilet usage
* Provide charting of gathered data in the form of tables and graphs
* Schedules Android Notification events (Reminders) a pre-set time after the last toilet use
* Integrates with Facebook to provide public notification of toilet use to friends

Who would use Toilet Tracker:
* Paraplegics who find toilet reminders useful to prevent compacting or bladder problems
* Pet owners caring for animals with pelvic injuries causing them to require regular help to use their litter box
* People in roles which only allow toilet use at certain times (pilots, surgeons, etc.)
* Anyone who wants to have fun tracking their toilet usage!

For more information, please see: http://www.beaksoft.com/toilettracker

title: Urinary Diseases
description:
The urinary system, also known as the renal system, produces, store and eliminates urine, the fluid waste excreted by the kidneys. The kidneys make urine by filtering waste and excrete water from blood. Urine travels from kidneys through two thin tubes called ureters and fills the bladder. When the bladder is full, a person urinates through the urethra to eliminate the waste.
The urinary system is susceptible to a variety of infections and other problems, including blockages and injuries. These can be treated by a urologist or another health care professional who specializes in the renal system.

title: UrineBook
description:
UrineBook √® un‚Äôapplicazione per valutare i propri sintomi urinari e per creare un diario minzionale digitale. Con un diario minzionale puoi raccogliere le informazioni riguardo a quello che bevi, quanto urini ed eventuali sintomi minzionali associati. Questa applicazione aiuta il tuo medico a valutare il tuo quadro di salute.

UrineBook fornisce questionari validati internazionalmente per valutare i tuoi disturbi. Il tuo medico ti aiuter√† a valutare i questionari che completi.


a.	Disclosures:
- UrineBook √® pensato per registrare e monitorare i liquidi assunti, le minzioni e le perdite urinarie.
- UrineBook non porta automaticamente ad una diagnosi. E‚Äô un supporto e uno strumento che pu√≤ essere utile ai professionisti sanitari per impostare il corretto iter diagnostico-terapeutico.
- Iniziando ad usare questa applicazione sei d‚Äôaccordo e comprendi che ogni tipo di calcolo o di dato √® soggetto a variazioni individuali e non sostituisce una formale valutazione del professionista sanitario.
- Il colloquio e la visita del medico rimangono necessari per un corretto inquadramento dell‚Äôeventuale problema di salute.
- I dati e i calcoli forniti dall‚ÄôApplicazione non possono e non devono essere usati per valutare il proprio stato di salute o per valutare o modificare eventuali terapie assunte o da assumere.

b.	Faq:
- Un diario minzionale, che cosa √®?
Diario minzionale √® un termine utilizzato da urologi, ginecologi e altri professionisti sanitari. Un diario minzionale √® un riassunto che elenca la quantit√† di liquidi assunti con l‚Äôalimentazione e la quantit√† di urina prodotta durante circa 24 ore. Durante un diario minzionale si registra la quantit√† di liquido che si beve o che si urina (utilizzando ad esempio un recipiente graduato). Inoltre viene registrato ogni evento incontrollato associato (perdita di urina o sintomi ad esempio).
- Perch√© dovrei completare un diario minzionale? 
Se ti rechi in visita da un medico perch√©‚Äô hai problemi a urinare, un diario minzionale √® molto importante per cercare impostare un corretto iter diagnostico-terapeutico. In questo modo il medico pu√≤ ottenere un quadro oggettivo del tuo quadro di salute. Un diario minzionale √® come un‚Äôimpronta digitale che permette di inquadrare meglio l‚Äôeventuale problema. Il medico, alla luce del quadro minzionale, pu√≤ decidere di procedere con ulteriori indagini strumentali o diagnostiche. 
- Quali sono i vantaggi di un diario minzionale digitale?
Un diario minzionale permette di raccogliere in tempo reale tutte le informazioni che servono in maniera precisa, tempestiva e consistente.

title: Studio Bloom
description:
Studio Bloom is The Bloom Method‚Äôs virtual fitness studio packed with a variety of workout styles and evidence-based education to help you thrive during pre-conception, pregnancy, and postpartum. We use techniques that have been proven to prevent and heal abdominal separation while preparing you for your biggest marathon yet‚Äîbirth.

Within Studio Bloom you will be supported on all levels of your motherhood journey including:
‚óã PREVENTION of pregnancy-related injures such as Diastasis Recti and incontinence.
‚óã HEALING + RESTRENGTHENING of your core and pelvic floor.
‚óã SWEATY + INTENTIONAL WORKOUTS that will meet you exactly where you are day to day.
‚óã TRAINING PROGRAMS designed to give you a roadmap to meet your fitness and recovery goals
‚óã YOGA CLASSES to keep you flowing through your asanas with added awareness to your core + pelvic floor.
‚óã MEDITATIONS created for mamas because #momlife we all deserve a few moments to reset.
‚óã NUTRITION and custom recipes by fertility and pre + postnatal nutritionist.
‚óã COMMUNITY SUPPORT inside our private online Bloom group.

NO EQUIPMENT? NO PROBLEM!
We have bodyweight-only classes. Plus any of our classes with equipment can be modified and done without equipment.

Join Studio Bloom today and get unlimited access to hundreds of on-demand classes for less than the cost of one fitness class!

-Already a member? Sign-In to access all the features and content. 
-New? Subscribe in the app to get instant access to content and features.

Studio Bloom offers an auto-renewing Monthly Subscription. You'll receive unlimited access to content on all your devices. Payment is charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Pricing varies by location and is confirmed prior to purchase. Subscription automatically renews each month unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. Manage your subscription in Account Settings.

comments: Quality companion app to your Bloom Method membership! Easy to use and find the class for you, and Chromecast support works seamlessly! I started the Bloom Method early on in my pregnancy and am so glad that high quality prenatal classes and support exist purely online these days. I've tried a couple other online prenatal programs and can honestly say that the Bloom Method is the best! The quality of the instruction is high - they provide multiple explanations and ways of thinking about the core techniques. I've been able to use the techniques throughout my days and in other fitness classes as well, and so far have had a very easy, healthy pregnancy! I highly recommend the Bloom Method!

I was an avid fitness junkie before I was pregnant, and continued through my first two trimesters with my normal workout routine. But as I shifted into my third trimester, my regular workouts were not cutting it, and while researching mama-friendly workouts stumbled upon Studio Bloom. I started with the foundations videos the first week of my third trimester and have continued it through my postpartum period, and have not looked back once! I cannot say enough how much more confident and strong I felt going into my birth, as well as how prepared I felt to tackle recovery afterwards. I have a deeper understanding of my pelvic floor and core than I ever have and it is completely thanks to Studio Bloom. There are a variety of workout types, calendars and programs you can choose from, and feel tailored to you as a mama in that moment. Also, there is a Facebook community of members who are supportive and willing to answer questions anytime you feel stuck - workout related or not!

Love this program! It's so important to learn how to breath and properly engage the core and these ladies are amazing at teaching us how to do that. I did these workouts throughout my pregnancy and believe this is how I healed so well after my delivery. Can't wait to continue on in postpartum.

I love Studio Bloom! They have been essential in my prenatal exercise regimine and postpartum recovery. I used their program for my third pregnancy and notice a world of difference with my strength during my pregnancy, during labor and now two weeks into recovery. I wish I had used them with my other two! I can not recommend Studio Bloom enough!

I love the Bloom Method because it teaches me how to work on the pelvic floor and core and it has helped me with the incontinence that I had. The app is just perfect since I can just go through the teachings anytime and I love on the go audios which helps to really concentrate more while working on those classes.

comments: Wow. What a difference! Pelvic floor exercises are no longer boring, so I actually do them now. I have stopped weeing when I sneeze. Winner!
this is different, quite encouraging, and fun! early days yet to see a difference
I wish I had this after my first delivery. I was doing kagels wrong all my life! Thankful to be building my pelvic floor correctly now.
Excellent product after service has been A+ would recommend

I love this product and app! I have PFD after giving birth to my 4th living child 3 months ago. It's been a hard recovery! I'm in physical therapy to try and rebuild my pelvic floor and core, this has been a wonderful tool to help recover. I do wish they had a manual mode where you can enter your physical therapy assigned exercises and use them. Hopefully soon.

title: New Kegel Exercise - Prostate Exercise
description:
‚Ä¢ New Kegel Exercise
‚Ä¢ PC Muscle Exercise  
‚Ä¢ Prostate Exercise  
‚Ä¢ Prostate Orgasm Exercise  

We'll introduce you New Kegel Exercise app.
In this app, you can learn not only New Kegel Exercise but also PC Muscle Exercise, Prostate Exercise and Prostate Orgasm Exercise.

New Kegel Exercise consists of repeatedly contracting and relaxing the pelvic diaphragm. 
In contrast, PC Muscle Exercise, Prostate Exercise, and Prostate Orgasm Exercise consist of repeatedly stretching and relaxing the target muscle among the muscles constituting the pelvic diaphragm.

Men generally only need to do stretching exercises.
At first do PC Muscle Exercise and Prostate Exercise, and after about three months, do PC Muscle Exercise and Prostate Orgasm Exercise.
‚Äª In case having a weakened pelvic diaphragm due to surgery for prostate cancer, at first do New Kegel Exercise, and after about six months, do PC Muscle Exercise.

Women do New Kegel Exercise or PC muscle exercise.
In case having a weakened pelvic diaphragm due to childbirth, gynecologic surgery, or menopause, at first do New Kegel Exercise, and after about six months, do PC Muscle Exercise.
But in most cases, except when having a weak pelvic diaphragm, do PC Muscle Exercise from the beginning.

‚óÜ New Kegel Exercise : Pelvic Floor Muscle Exercise

New Kegel Exercise consists of repeatedly contracting and relaxing the pelvic diaphragm.
Many people know Kegel Exercise as an exercise to tighten the urethra or anal canal. However, in fact, repeated contraction of the urethral or anal sphincter does not help to strengthen the pelvic diaphragm.

New Kegel Exercise is a new way of Kegel Exercise, and anyone who understands the principles of New Kegel Exercise can do Kegel Exercise correctly. 

‚óÜ PC Muscle Exercise  

PC Muscle Exercise consists of repeatedly stretching and relaxing the pubococcygeus muscles. 

It helps to prevent and treat urinary incontinence, fecal incontinence, constipation and levator ani syndrome.
Especially when you have constipation, you can easily expel feces by stretching both pubococcygeus muscles during defecation.

‚óÜ Prostate Exercise  

Prostate Exercise consists of repeatedly stretching and relaxing the levator prostatae muscles which attach to both sides of the prostate.
It also repeatedly stretches and relaxes both ischiocavernosus muscles which are involved in penile erection.

Prostate Exercise improves the circulation of the prostate, so the prostate becomes healthy and helps to prevent and treat benign prostatic hypertrophy(BPH) and premature ejaculation.
And it will make your¬†erection harder¬†and longer.

‚óÜ Prostate Orgasm Exercise 

Prostate Orgasm Exercise consists of repeatedly stretching and relaxing the levator prostatae muscles which attach to both sides of the prostate.
If you repeat Prostate Orgasm Exercise, it increases the blood flow to the prostate, causing the prostate to become swollen, and you will experience dry orgasm.

Prostate Orgasm Exercise is not just for sexual pleasure.
Prostate Orgasm Exercise improves the circulation of the prostate, so the prostate becomes healthy and it is particularly effective in preventing and treating benign prostatic hypertrophy(BPH) and premature ejaculation.
It can also be expected to help prevent prostate cancer.

‚óà Developer Profiles

-Kiwon Cho M.D. 
-Ph.D. in Anatomy
-Board Certified¬†General Surgeon
-Director of the KEGELISE

‚Äª This app is provided by streaming media services.
Therefore, the video may be loaded slowly or can not be played when the network is in poor condition.
In these cases, please convert the network settings from Wi-Fi to LTE / 4G.
If the video still does not play properly, move to a place where the network is in good condition and try again.

title: mySymptoms Food Diary & Symptom Tracker (Lite)
description:
Record, track, and analyze your food, mood, and symptoms to gain insights into your digestive health. 

mySymptoms makes logging a food and symptom diary easy - remembering your favorite foods and providing customizable symptoms. The diary analysis reveals any patterns that emerge between your diet and symptoms. Print a PDF (Android 4.4 or above) / web report of your diary/journal.


DIARY / JOURNAL

‚Ä¢ Record food, drink, medication, stress, exercise, environmental factors, and other activities and notes 
‚Ä¢ Record any symptoms you experience (including intensity, duration, and notes) 
‚Ä¢ Record your energy, sleep quality, and bowel movements (using Bristol scale)
‚Ä¢ View and modify your diary entries 
‚Ä¢ Create and modify your own symptoms 
‚Ä¢ Export your food diary as a PDF (Android 4.4 or above), CSV, or Web report for printing or sharing


INSIGHTS

‚Ä¢ Discover any patterns between your diet and symptoms
‚Ä¢ View suspect foods, trends, and correlations between food and symptoms
‚Ä¢ Configurable analysis


ORGANIZER 

‚Ä¢ Add or modify your own drinks, foods, medications, exercises, and other activities 
‚Ä¢ Add or modify meals with your own ingredients 
‚Ä¢ Add or modify detailed ingredients to any item ‚Äì food, drink or medication 


HOW TO USE

‚Ä¢ Simply begin by tracking your meals along with any symptoms you experience
‚Ä¢ Over time, the more you track, the more the analysis algorithms have to work with to provide any insights


mySymptoms is used by sufferers of:

‚Ä¢ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
‚Ä¢ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
‚Ä¢ Food intolerance and sensitivities such as dairy, gluten, lactose
‚Ä¢ Acid reflux
‚Ä¢ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚Ä¢ Celiac disease
‚Ä¢ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
‚Ä¢ Ulcerative colitis
‚Ä¢ Migraines & cluster headaches
‚Ä¢ Eczema
‚Ä¢ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions 

mySymptoms is also useful for recording a FODMAP diet.


Please note that the analysis algorithms use statistical methods to identify suspect foods/items and do not understand your diet or specific health circumstances. 


The information provided by this app is not medical advice. Always consult a doctor if you have any concerns about your health. Always consult a licensed health professional prior to modifying your diet.


GO PREMIUM

‚Ä¢ Advanced analysis including ingredients and food groups (where provided)
‚Ä¢ Detailed results for each item includes more specific information, a histogram and trend chart 
‚Ä¢ Review events a food or symptom appears in
‚Ä¢ No adverts


mySymptoms also provides a list of common symptoms for food intolerance, IBS, IBD and Crohn's, but you can add extra symptoms as required.


Terms: http://mysymptoms.net/terms


NOTE: mySymptoms Food Diary currently supports portrait orientation only.


SUPPORT

If you experience any issues with mySymptoms, then please contact our support team - we will do our utmost to resolve the issue as soon as possible. Thanks!

support@skygazerlabs.com

MORE INFORMATION

Web: www.mysymptoms.net
Twitter: twitter.com/mysymptoms
Facebook: fb.me/mySymptoms
Enquiries: hello@mysymptoms.net

recentChanges: + Fix for file export on Android 10
comments: I just downloaded this app but I already love it! I love that it doesn't count calories and focuses on the way food makes you feel instead. I'm also loving every other category that you can track, like energy level, medication, environment, and mood. This is going to be so helpful with managing my chronic illness! Thank you to the developer! If I continue to use it I am for sure buying premium!

Paid premium, and didn't recieve. Sending questions and suggestions via email, and Facebook. No answer because they are closed on weekends. This is a useful app, for people suffering from gut issues caused by foods. They really need to add nutrition info to the diary because those with gastroparesis need to eat less fiber and not more. I have not found an app where the amount of fiber is customizable. And for this app, it would be appropriate.

Really good set up, easy to use. I like it a lot. I can log any food ingredients that I eat, the time and date, my mood at the time, and any symptoms I get, and much more. A very good diary to log my food and drink intake.

Once you've got your regular entries in its really quick to use. I like the range of options available. Mealtimes, exercise, mood, environment, sleep etc. Finding it really useful, plus I can send a report to my GP. üòä
This is the best app I could have found to help me focus on my eating and health. I like the flexibility of being able to write notes for entries and to add symptoms. I highly recommend to others.

title: Where is Public Toilet
description:
Note:
1. Google Play Service is a must for this app. The database has to be downloaded for the first time and about 30s is needed for downloading world database if using WIFI.
2. We could not guarantee all toilets are included and correct In this ever-changing era, but we're keeping improving them. If you found that some toilets are missing or incorrect, it would be great if you could utilize the built-in easy report feature to add/fix them, which will contribute to the community and benefit all users. Or you could send us an email about them then we'll try to improve them.

Features:
More than 280,000 public toilets in the World are available for you when just in need. Support world-level/continent-level/Australia database, "Download Database" can be used to switch between World version and Continent version anytime.

From Map Mode, you can find the nearest, most suitable restrooms for your self in several seconds based on your current location and it can guide you to the destination via Google Route function. You can utilize Google StreetView to confirm whether the toilet is available or not.

From List Mode, you can acquire detail information about the surrounding restrooms, such as the location of the nearest public toilet, details of opening hours, accessibility, parking and other features. Furthermore, the list can be sorted by the distance to me, the distance to map centre or alphabetical sequence.

This is an awesome App which will bail you out of a sticky situation, since it can filter restrooms by toilet types, accessibility types(male, female, unisex, LHT, RHT, ambulant, parking, MLAK) and extra features (parking, babychange, adultchange, shower, water, sharps, sanitary) supplied.

Thanks for the data from the National Public Toilet Map (the Toilet Map) funded by Australian Government Department of Social Services and other data providers.

Multiple languages are supported. More translations or improvement could be added through this Crowdin link  https://crwd.in/where-is-public-toilet

recentChanges: Fix: Solve some exceptions
comments: Buggy but great idea and use is good when working. Edit: Regarding the buggyness, I had to delete and redownload the app to get the icons to show up. Doesn't always show all of them. But after the redownload it's doing better, despite my more rural area, which is nice. Likely reupdate this after I've used it longer.

This app constantly nudges you like Google to activate not only normal GPS based location but "high accuracy" location service which only means all your location data then go to Google. Read the fineprint. I don't want this and it's absolutely not necessary for this or any other app, just easier to implement because Google wants it that way. You said 1 month ago you are going to fix this asap! Nothing happened. Beside that it showed only a few toilets in Austria. 100km away. Quite useless.

I was disappointed with this app. I know that it takes a community effort for apps like this to succeed but after calling upon it more than a handful of times, and not once seeing a bathroom indicated, it's become obvious that my community sees value in keeping its lavatory locations secret, and so I will keep with this tradition. Unfortunately this does not bode well for this app.
Works well for me. Could do with more community input. I think the initial set of toilets must come from a database. Accurate but no information on most of them (cost/condition etc).

Very good for travelling around with, shame some toilets are closed out of peak season & of course due to covid many establishments think it better to close toilets so people can't go or have to use a Bush. No fault of the app but in current times it pays to keep your options open.

title: Symptom Tracker & Medicine, Health Symptoms Diary

CareClinic works well for medication management, people also use it as a headache tracker, symptom tracker and symptoms diary or journal. Track vitamins, supplements, birth control, conditions, medication, symptoms, nutrition, activity, daily vitals, therapies, pregnancy, baby symptoms, notes and automatically discover correlations & triggers.

‚úîÔ∏èADD YOUR CARE TEAM TO SHARE REPORTS & INSIGHTS üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è

‚úîÔ∏èINTEGRATE With WEARABLES üì≤

üëçüèΩEssential for managing any chronic illness or health symptoms: Chronic Pain, Cancer, Fibromyalgia, IBD & IBS (Bowel Movements), Urine, Diabetes Care, COPD, Epilepsy, Psoriasis, Rheumatoid Arthritis, Fibromyalgia, Multiple sclerosis (MS Symptoms), IPF. Also for mental health: ADHD, Headache Tracker, Depression, Anxiety, PMS & other disorders

comments: Works well as medication reminder! Using it to track my mood for CBT. I've upgraded to be able to share my treatment with my family and therapist.. Didn't see this functionality in other apps.

App freezes every time I try to cancel subscription.

To me, the app was not user-friendly. I found myself entering the same information repeatedly and sometimes the data just would not save (specifically in the Goals section). Second, the format provides low visibility. I was looking for something thst displays data like a calendar with icons and notes to show my doctors an overall picture of my health for each day. This is more like a database that has to be searched by individual criteria. I can't use this app in its current format.
Simple and organized; has a user-friendly interface! A very helpful app!

title: PoopLog
description:
PoopLog is a free application that allows you to track your bowel movements using the Bristol Stool Scale.  

20+ Options Available To PoopLog  
Location, Photos, Notes, Colours, Blood and Mucus Content, Prior Discomfort, Urgency Level and Pain Level, Medication, Evacuation Completeness, Headache, Nausea, Fever, Backache, Cramps, Corn & More! Choose which options to show by default in the Settings.

Easy To Review History  
Review your PoopLog history as an expandable list, separated by month; or display each entry directly on a calendar! Map view coming soon! On large screens, your entry details will be displayed alongside your history!

Chart, Totals & Trends  
Pie charts, Bar charts, Scatter charts, Averages, and Totals. PoopLog empowers you to know more about your bowel health, inside and out!

Reporting & Analysis  
Create, Save, and Share customized reports for anyone to review. Choose between an easy-to-read plain-text report, a rich-text report with embedded photos, or a CSV report which unleashes your data, making it available to import into any spreadsheet or charting app for further analysis.

Focus on the Details  
Every PoopLog entry is viewable as a rich detailed view. On large screens and tablets, your details will be displayed in a secondary pane alongside your Overview or History views.

Share your PoopLog  
When you share any PoopLog entry, you can choose to share only a few, or all of the options attached to that entry (location, note and photo only for example).


Frequently Asked Questions  
https://www.pooplog.xyz/#faq


Required Permissions:

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉApproximate & Precise Location  
‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉThis permission is required if you wish to add your location to an entry. Your location is never transmitted outside of the app as part of any analytics and no location information is ever transmitted out from your device to anyone, ever, unless you select the share option for a PoopLog entry or report.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉRead & Write Internal Storage  
‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉThis permission is required if you wish to save photos with entries, or if you wish to save a created report, or if you wish to restore or backup your entries. The only non-system folders PoopLog ever looks at are /PoopLog/Photos/, /PoopLog/Reports/, & /PoopLog/Backups/.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉRead Google Service Configuration  
‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉThis permission is required as part of the Google Play Services, which is used to obtain your location. PoopLog must check your Google Configuration to see if you have a compatible version of Google Play Services installed in order to obtain your location.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉNetwork Services  
‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉThis permission is primarily required to obtain maps from Google whenever you choose to add and display your location to an entry. In addition, if you choose to opt-in to analytics, PoopLog will transmit non-identifiable usage data which will help the developer, Kevin, know which PoopLog features are most popular and require further development. The information collected will never contain or pertain to any of your entries, and will only transmit what sections of the app you navigate to. By design, PoopLog user data will never be transmitted outside of the app, unless an entry or report is directly shared.

Issues Sharing?  
Some apps contain a flaw where it believes you are attempting to share a link, rather than share text. If you are having an issue with a particular app, feel free to email me. and I'll see what I can do to support it!

Stay tuned to @kefsco, or https://www.pooplog.xyz/ for any news!

2.52; latest version; released 10/26/2016 *minor bugfix*

comments: Reports are not useful enough and data input fields are limited. Other than these two major problems everything seems clean and nicely built.

Great app. Easy to use. Would love to see a duration option. Time started / ended. I would love to be able to show that to my doctors. Also under the OVERVIEW TOTALS, and possibly elsewhere if that total is pulled, mine states 68 total entries, 49 days with multiple entries. However I have only used the app for 18 days. That 49 days with multiple entries result is incorrect.
Pretty good but "Add a Photo" option should be a defaul optiont, not an extra one to search for.

Brill app only thing I would strongly suggest to improve the app would be to use various colours when looking at trend. As with everything being in a shade of brown it is very difficult & almost impossible to get a clear view of graphs etc.
As someone who suffers from IBD, this app is a life saver. I can track my bowel movements and write notes. Not only can you track how often you go, but the type of bowel movement as well.

title: Poop Tracker - Toilet Log, Bowel Movement Analysis
description:
Track and analyse your bowel movements easily with Poop Tracker, then print out your stool analysis to quickly and easily share this data with your doctor.

Ever wonder what your bowel movements mean and how they affect your health? Curious to find out how frequently you suffer from bowel conditions like constipation, diarrhea, or bloody stool? Well now tracking your bowel movements is easier than ever. 

Find out what consistency, color, frequency, and urgency means for your health by tracking and analyzing these stats over time, then use that data to determine if any issues, such as IBS, or crohn's are present.

Poop Tracker uses the Bristol Stool Scale to determine the quality of your poop and allows you to track and analyze your bowel movement data across all of your log entries.

Poop Tracker features include:

- Easily and quickly log every poop you take.

- Track poop stats like colour, Stool type (Bristol Stool Scale), urgency, size, bloody stool, pain, and custom notes. These metrics can be important to determine if you have any bowel problems such as diarrhea, constipation, ibs (irritable bowel syndrome), colitis, crohn's disease or any other chronic condition.

- Log 'No Poop' days and leave custom notes when you're constipated.

- View and modify previous poop log entries with our comprehensive calendar view of your stool history.

- Export or Import a CSV data file of all of your stool entries so your data can be saved and restored, or sent to your healthcare provider.

- View a data breakdown and graph of your stool statistics over time including metrics like when your bowel movements happen and a day by day history (premium feature).


Why track your bowel movements?

Tracking bowel movements can be a useful tool to gauge your stool health over time and potentially uncover any chronic problems you might have such as: IBS (Irritable bowel syndrome), Crohn's disease, Colitis, Celiac disease, Chronic Diarrhea, or Constipation by noticing patterns and irregularities in your stool that you may not have noticed otherwise.


If you already suffer from a chronic bowel condition, you can also benefit from maintaining a poop log as it allows you to monitor the severity of your symptoms and progression of these life altering diseases over time and share this data quickly and easily with your doctor.


About the Bristol Stool Scale:

The Bristol stool scale, or BSF scale is a diagnostic medical tool designed to classify the form of human stool into seven categories. It is used in both clinical and experimental fields. It is sometimes referred to in the UK as the Meyers scale. This is the scale used to track 'Type' in Poop Tracker because it is the most developed standard in many countries for categorizing feces.

recentChanges: + Hotfixed visual bug that was affecting the homepage on older versions of Android
comments: I like it. I was going to delete it to be honest. But when I started to look for a replacement I couldn't find one that was any better or even as good. I even cancelled my subscription but I think I am going to re-sub at the end of the month. The only thing I don't like is I find the analysis kind of complicated. I get a quicker picture of what's going on just looking at the calendar. Also what is the brown triangle in the right hand corner on some of my days in calendar?
Excellent app. Would be even better if there was somewhere to enter symptoms; stomach cramps, etc. Edit: Maybe include Symptoms, in the menu where Bowel Movement, and Medication, is? Thank you!
Easy to use and navigate. Been very handy keeping track of me. Just don't like you have to pay for full experiences

This app has been so useful for me. I have IBS and struggle with bowel movements and this is ideal being able to track what they're like and how close/far apart they are. The one thing I would change would be where you log movements as "urgent" or not, if there was blood and if there was pain I'd add a chart. It would be useful to know by looking back if a movement has a little blood, or a lot. If it was a lot painful or just a lite.

After my issues were addressed by the developers I'm glad to see improvement and interaction. However I still do not agree with the increase in price of the app since the application doesn't appear to use servers in order to function. It does work somewhat well,I just wish it had features for enema uses, adult diapers, and milliliters. But for the free version it does work.

title: Urinox
description:
Keep track of your Urinox dipstick urine analysis results using the Urinox app. 

Monitor and track the progress of each of the following indicators over time:
1. Leukocytes
2. Nitrite
3. Urobilinogen
4. Protein
5. pH
6. Blood
7. Specific Gravity

summary: Urinalysis data logging for Urinox Urinalysis test strips by Diagnox
recentChanges:
Urinox-10 app for recording results from Urinox-10 parameters urinalysis test strips.
Enhanced User Interface, optimized for different screen sizes.
comments: How can you "monitor" when there is no apparent way to retain the data? As far as I can tell, you can only enter one test strip of data, which gets over written the next time you enter your results. That is not helpful. The app provides some helpful reference information, but the greatest benefit would be to see historical results to identify trends. Disappointing.

I like the ease of navigation within the app and the resources as well as the flags and notes when a level is abnormal. Very cool feature. Only thing is I wish the app had a built in timer so I didn't have to go back and forth between my timer and the app. Also, I can't seem to find a way to edit my results. What if I had entered them incorrectly or wanted to put a time stamp for a test previously taken? If there is a way to edit, this app is near perfect!
How does this not integrate a timer?? It's the only difficult part of this process and the only clear advantage to using an app.... Or one would have thought.
Excellent app to monitor and track your urinalysis results. Very easy to use.
Works great and keeps a record.

title: PainScale - Free Chronic Pain Tracker Diary
description:
The Popular pain tracking app for iOS and Android !.  Awarded one of the Best Fibromyalgia apps of 2019 ‚Äì by Healthline. Join over 100,000 chronic pain patients who manage and scale their pain and symptoms with Painscale; the highly-ranked pain tracker health app on the web! 

The PainScale app offers a FREE suite of pain management tools to help chronic pain patients to scale their pain.
Manage a Pain Tracker Diary!

Created with input from doctors and chronic pain patients, the Pain Diary acts as a pain tracker and organizes all the information the patient needs in one accessible location. With over 800 organized articles, health tips, exercises, information on pain meditation programs and treatment options, pain management becomes easier.   	

PainScale provides personalized pain management education for users. Trusted content. is available to help people understand their symptoms and better manage their condition. By providing insights to a community of other patients who share their treatment information, PainScale helps patients discover information about treatment options that may work for their condition.
PainScale is an easy and simple to use, pain and health tracker app.
 
Features

 ‚Ä¢ Pain Diary ‚Äì log and track your pain to track triggers, pain intensity, symptoms, treatments, medications, activity, mood, and sleep digital scale.
 ‚Ä¢ Pain Reports ‚Äì get and send summary and detailed reports for better patient-physician communication, you can take all the information you need from the Pain Diary.
 ‚Ä¢ Insights - personal tips to help you discover information about treatment options to better manage your condition
‚Ä¢ Trusted Content ‚Äì get FREE access to a searchable library of articles, videos, and meditations to help find pain relief,
 ‚Ä¢ Daily Health Tips ‚Äì get daily meditation, stretches, and exercise routines, everything you need to help you cope with your chronic pain
 ‚Ä¢ Integration with Google Fit ‚Äì simplified and seamless connectivity with Google Fit for tracking health and fitness activity
 ‚Ä¢ Reminders ‚Äì get reminders to help stay engaged with restoring your health
 ‚Ä¢ Care Team Communication - tap-to-call and tap-to message functionality options that connects you directly with your Physician and Support Network
 ‚Ä¢ Customize your experience for pain management with a personal profile
Get the info you need in the following topics:

 ‚Ä¢ Chronic pain
 ‚Ä¢ Pain relief
 ‚Ä¢ Lower back pain
 ‚Ä¢ Back pain
 ‚Ä¢ Neck pain
 ‚Ä¢ A migraine
 ‚Ä¢ Fibromyalgia
 ‚Ä¢ Failed back surgery
 ‚Ä¢ CRPS
 ‚Ä¢ Arthritis
 ‚Ä¢ Pain management
 ‚Ä¢ Coping
 ‚Ä¢ Neuropathy
 ‚Ä¢ Nerve pain

Get Help: contact us at help@painscale.com
Visit Us: Access your account on the web.

Log in at https://www.painscale.com
Like Us: Join the PainScale community by liking us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/MyPainScale/
 

What are the things that make your pain increase, what spikes or triggers it, and what helps you the most?
PainScale helps you get actionable insights to better your pain relief and health in general. 

Pain scale and pain diary have been used by physicians for almost five decades ‚Äì it is one of the most valuable tools in pain management. Painscale.com takes advantage of the modern digital technologies to provide an easy to use pain tracking solution using the same proven pain management methods. PainScale.com web site and the app is designed for educational purposes only. If you have any concerns about your own health or the health of someone else, you should always consult with a physician or other healthcare professional

recentChanges: Added new personal insights for Triggers and Symptoms and bug fixes
comments: Outstanding App to help you track pain types, areas and symptoms. Able to show different pain types in different areas of the body. I love that you can add notes as well in journal entries! The reports are fantastic and easy to email with you deciding the custom time span. The insights that can show correlation between activity, weather, and other triggers really helps. Love that I can attach to Samsung Health and thus my sleep, EKGs and pulse rate, BP, etc to see correlations! Great App!!!

I've been using this app for months now and I still love it. It's easy to use, it syncs with my Samsung Health, and the helpful articles and tips are normally quick reads and informative, and it has easy adjustments in the settings. I highly recommend this app.

So far it's a good useful app. One suggestion. Love to have ability to add multiple entries during the day without altering my earlier input.This will help me better track triggers and effectiveness of the different things I do to help alleviate my pain. Also, there needs to be room for more than one entry for doc location,insurance& pain on opposite side of the body.If I have pain in back of legs and knees, the figure turns around but deleted the previous tagged body pain location.

I've only been using this app for a short time but so far it is the best that I have tried. I have chronic pain with various etiologies and the app has a detailed pain map that allows me to more precisely record my pain. The automatic time stamp is a great feature as is the ability to link it to my Fitbit for superior insights that corralate sleep and activity to pain levels. Im holding off on that 5th star because I am still learning the app and all of its functionality.

The PainScale app has been great! I am able to track my whole day. Pain, food and anything else I need. I have added my glucose readings in the notes. I am also able to put on there my activities making me able to see any issues and also my progress. Thank you!

title: Plop - poop tracker & analyzer
description:
ÔºäEasy to record color, shape and/or symptoms
ÔºäInstantly analyze your data 
ÔºäInsightful stats and trends to navigate your health

TRACK DAILY PROGRESS
You track your steps and heart rate; you track your calories and weight; you track your cycle and mood; why not track your droppings? You can learn a lot about your body's health by observing your stool.

DELIVER PERSONALIZED SUGGESTION
Doctors regularly ask for stool and urine samples as part of the diagnostic process. Your stool can reveal signs of infection, digestive issues or more serious health problems. Pay attention to what is going on with your body.

GENERATE TRENDS OVER TIME
Your waste is what can tell you the most about your health. Keep a log of your logs for your health; it's a dirty job, but someone's gotta do it!

Your intestines contain a rich ecosystem of germs, bacteria, and cells that promote a healthy immunity system. Taking care of your intestinal health is taking care of your overall health! Track your intestinal health with the Plop app, and get a health heads up thanks to your bottom.

Disclaimer:
Plop is not intended to self-diagnose, self-treat, self-alleviate or to exclusively compensate for any disease or disability. If you have any concern, please consult with your doctor, or other qualified healthcare professional before using this App. However, you are welcome to use this app, for self-tracking, or as a reference to support your visit to a doctor or other qualified healthcare professional. Use this App at your own risk. The creators don't take any responsibility for direct or indirect damage that could result from its use.

descriptionHTML:
ÔºäEasy to record color, shape and/or symptoms
ÔºäInstantly analyze your data
ÔºäInsightful stats and trends to navigate your health

TRACK DAILY PROGRESS
You track your steps and heart rate; you track your calories and weight; you track your cycle and mood; why not track your droppings? You can learn a lot about your body's health by observing your stool.

DELIVER PERSONALIZED SUGGESTION
Doctors regularly ask for stool and urine samples as part of the diagnostic process. Your stool can reveal signs of infection, digestive issues or more serious health problems. Pay attention to what is going on with your body.

GENERATE TRENDS OVER TIME
Your waste is what can tell you the most about your health. Keep a log of your logs for your health; it's a dirty job, but someone's gotta do it!

Your intestines contain a rich ecosystem of germs, bacteria, and cells that promote a healthy immunity system. Taking care of your intestinal health is taking care of your overall health! Track your intestinal health with the Plop app, and get a health heads up thanks to your bottom.

Disclaimer:
Plop is not intended to self-diagnose, self-treat, self-alleviate or to exclusively compensate for any disease or disability. If you have any concern, please consult with your doctor, or other qualified healthcare professional before using this App. However, you are welcome to use this app, for self-tracking, or as a reference to support your visit to a doctor or other qualified healthcare professional. Use this App at your own risk. The creators don't take any responsibility for direct or indirect damage that could result from its use.

comments: In response to PlopüòÄ Instead of baking the perfect poo after food I love, maybe "perfect plop" , "normal" , "ideal", the picture is the best way to "match " to the description anyhow. You could name it Bob! Great except that the description for a normal poo is SAUSAGE .. I WOULD RATHER NOT HAVE MY FOOD DESCRIBE MY POO!! GROSS! I JUST DON'T EVEN DESCRIBE IT. I WISHED I COULD BECAUSE THAT WOULD BE HELPFUL BUT THE ASSOCIATION IS NOT COOL!! OTHERWISE I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP!

Hi, I loved the app and have been using for weeks but unfortunately I just opened the app and it was completely empty - all my data I've been working hard to input for weeks is gone as if I am a brand new user - it even said welcome to the app when I opened it this morning. :( I definitely didn't reset anything so am really perplexed as to what happened and why it lost all my data suddenly.

I like the application. Nice fratures especially the analyzer and learn. I would like to suggest for improvement, it would be nice to have an account for this so my logs will be saved and if I change my phone or use other devices, I wouldnt worry about losing my data. I can export the data but that would become a raw data and not analyzed. Importing data and saving thru google drive would be added value. Overal, good app. Thank you for this application. Its a great help. üôÇ

Is good for tracking but I have a serious problem and was tracking for my next doctors appt and lost all the previous months data. Not sure if this app just does a month at a time and doesn't save month to month. If you need long term tracking may not be the one

A good tracking app with lots of entry options. It is early days in my use (<2 weeks) but the analyser seems to be good too. Would proably get 5 if it also had time tracking ability and perhaps more IBD symptoms such as pain/flatulence/pus/spasms.

title: Wil Pelvic Floor Trainer
description:
***   IMPORTANT   ***

For a complete experience, you need a Wil Sensor.

************

Wil is a core training programme that helps you regain control over your pelvic floor muscles. This app tracks your activity, liquid intake and all the while keeps you motivated. The exercises are fun, brief and easily accessible with a special focus on the integration of pelvic floor training within daily life.

Wil follows 3 basic principles:
1. Feel your pelvic floor muscles
2. Coordinate your pelvic floor muscles in daily life
3. Strengthen your back, core and pelvic floor muscles

During the pelvic floor exercise programme, you are supported by Wil Underwear, a beautiful absorbing underwear. After downloading the app you will be asked to sync the sensor to proceed with the training. 

Wil is a wearable technology solution born from the philosophy to empower men's everyday. Wil is designed for men who suffer from incontinence, especially after prostate surgery. A social taboo yet a super common condition, we know that mild incontinence impacts your life.

Wil is created by LifeSense Group. We bring medical technology to the consumer market and improve consumer products for medical use. By offering the tools to understand and improve one‚Äôs condition, we bring back sense of life!

title: Kegel Lift! 4All a pelvic floor exercise trainer
description:
Kegel Lift! 4All kegel trainer helps support and encourage you to carry out your kegels which are needed to keep your pelvic floor in good health. To stop you having incontinence problems such as leaking urine accidentally if you run, laugh, cough, sneeze or lift something heavy. 

The app uses the idea of a lift moving to higher levels to allow motivation to progress. 
Please read the information links on the start up screen in white to make sure you have a good understanding of pelvic floor muscles, the benefits of having a healthy pelvic floor and finding the ‚Äòknack‚Äô of using them in every day life amongst lots of useful information including exercises to avoid if you do have weak pelvic floor muscles and exercises that are pelvic floor safe. 

Please read the Information and How to do kegels link, in the app before using it, here it will explain in detail all you need to know to do the kegel exercises correctly.
 
When you choose the Start button you have the different levels such as  Auto to just start the exercises or start at Beginner, which has targets set that when you reach them, it immediately moves you to Intermediate and so on. You will progress at your own pace through the levels all the way to Expert! It also maintains a record of your exercises completed for each day.

You will learn how to do long hold kegels for the duration of 10 seconds squeezing your pelvic floor muscles and then relaxing them for 10 seconds this will be done for 10 repetitions and short hold kegels where you will squeeze your muscles for 1 second,  10 repetitions, this will be classed as one set, your aim is to do 3 sets each day and to motivate you there is a reminder setting that you can add 3 chosen times that will appear on your phone to notify you to do your kegels every day at those times.

title: Stool Log - Bowel Movement Journal
description:
This app makes it very easy to log your bowel movements. You can classify your stool with help of the bristol stool scale and it will calculate a lot of interesting statistics for you.

There are two modes: in the simple mode you can log start time (will be set automatically on start), end time (will be set automatically as well), and the stool type according to the bristol stool scale. In the detailed mode you can log additional color, consisteny, weight/volume and your feeling.

You can add some notes to the current session in both modes.

Your data belongs to you! You are able to export your data at any time and use it as a CSV file (a plain text file). Your data is not collected or transmitted!

You can add some notes to the current session in both modes.

Your data belongs to you! You are able to export your data at any time and use it as a CSV file (a plain text file). Your data is not collected or transmitted!

recentChanges: Welcome to the initial release version! Any feedback would be greatly appreciated.
comments: Complete waste of time! Don't use the free version of this app if you need to keep a long term record of your bowel motions. I didn't realise the data would disappear until I needed to refer to it for a medical appointment and couldn't access anything more than 5 days old! I think they should make that more obvious! I'm so angry I wish I could give zero stars!

Best app üëå it is so important for anyone who either has a family history or has issues themselves to keep track, and this does it beautifully. You can even add notes to your entries. And the graph and chart is really great. Perfect. Thanks so much
Great app for keeping tabs on your health. I am currently taking medication that's interfering with regularity so I'm finding this really helpful.
Easy. Stats are informative. No annoing interruptions from ads (at least not yet).
This has helped me so much, I needed a way to track it for my doctors appt and this app does an amazing job, I recommend this to anyone who needs a tracker

title: Cara Care: FODMAP, IBD, IBS Tracker, Poop Tracker
description:
Cara Care takes the mystery out of your digestion. It‚Äôs the easiest way to holistically manage and track GI issues like IBS, IBD, GERD, Celiac, dyspepsia, or food intolerances.

Track and log your poop, stress, food, pain, and other symptoms (e.g. from IBS) with just a few taps. 

The app shows you what your food and symptoms are on your best and worst IBS days.

Start making connections between your diet, your gut, and your overall well-being.

Cara Care‚Äôs premium 12-week IBS program is your personalized guide to following the low FODMAP diet. You‚Äôll get unlimited text chat with a personal dietitian helps you every step of the way in navigating your IBS and beginning low FODMAP. Based on 5,000+ hours of nutritional counseling with people who have IBS. 

-------

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO OUR BEST IN CLASS IBS TRACKER AND POOP TRACKER

üçú Food Tracker: Save time by adding your favorites and photos if you follow low FODMAP, gluten free, or other diets
üßª Poop Tracker: Log different types of bowel movements
üìã Symptom Tracker: Track bloating, constipation, diarrhea, pain, and other IBS symptoms
ü©∫ Medical Log: Record important information about your period, skin, workouts, sleep, pain, and medication

PERSONALIZED ANALYSIS

‚úÖ Food on your best and worst days is shown in your dashboard 
‚úÖ Share your app data easily with your primary care provider or gastroenterologist
‚úÖ Access a library of actionable, science-based tips for living with IBS
‚úÖ Low FODMAP recipes

MAKE LIFE WITH IBS EASIER: JOIN A 12-WEEK IBS LOW FODMAP PROGRAM

üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Free unlimited text chat with your personal dietitian
üìä Get personalized analysis on your symptoms and diet from your dietitian
ü•£ Follow a self-paced, 12-week action plan for the low FODMAP IBS diet  
üî¨ Get science-backed tips on managing IBS, with actionable takeaways at every step
üìù Track your progress with medically-validated questionnaires 

CARA CARE USER PHOEBE SAYS:

"With Cara Care, for the first time I had the feeling that someone wanted to help me. Thanks to the program, I felt much better! Of course there are problems here and there, but I have made a lot of progress and can enjoy eating again." ‚Äì Phoebe

NOT JUST FOR IBS. 

Cara Care is designed for people with chronic gut conditions such as irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), and IBD (Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis and microscopic colitis). But Cara Care‚Äôs symptom tracker can also help you with:

‚Ä¢ Bowel problems such as acid reflux, dyspepsia, nausea, chronic abdominal pain, bloating, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) with symptoms such as chronic bloating, abdominal pain, constipation and diarrhea
‚Ä¢ Short bowel syndrome, small intestinal bacterial overgrowth (SIBO), gastritis, celiac disease
‚Ä¢ Diets such as gluten-free, fructose-free, histamine-free and lactose-free, clean eating, healthy eating, keto
‚Ä¢ Food intolerances and sensitivities such as dairy, lactose, cow's milk allergy, fructose, histamine, gluten/wheat
‚Ä¢ Leaky gut syndrome & Candida albicans
‚Ä¢ Period/menstrual cycle-related digestive problems

We would ‚ù§Ô∏è to hear from you.

Send your questions, suggestions, and feedback to hello@cara.care
Find us on: https://cara.care

comments: Great While It Lasted. I really thought I had found the perfect app to track my symptoms. I spent a huge amount of time entering info. Then, I made the mistake of logging out. Now it won't let me log back in. It says it's sending me a confirmation email to restore my data. But I'm not getting it. I've tried a dozen times & checked my spam/junk folder a hundred times. I'm not receiving the email. I'm so very disappointed. I haven't found another app that covers so much detail. :-(

Adding food and meds can be tedious as a lot of options aren't available. This makes sense as the developer is based in Germany and I live in the US. I also don't add each ingredient, because so many foods have some degree of salt or oil, and those show up in the "best/worst ingredients," even though I know those aren't my triggers. I think the most irritating part is that when I add "no poop" so I can log symptoms, it shows in the report that I pooped. Still a mostly useful app.

I like the idea of this, especially the food tracker to see what foods may be causing me trouble. The only really frustrating part is also the food tracker. They only seem to have half the things I try and put in and it really isn't that user friendly with that function either. The rest of it works pretty well so, despite the food tracker being what I really wanted, I mostly just record symptoms which, in itself, is still helpful.

Great app and is very detailed with a nice user interface. My only critism is when adding pictures to food - it automatically offers to crop or zoom in a landscape rectangle and you can never get the full thing you want in the picture as you can only get part of it. It would be better if it was free crop or zoom within a certain squared area, not a landscape rectangle. An option to export to excel would also be great.
The UI experience is bad and not intuitive. I found it frustrating to use.

title: Chiku ‚Äì Journal / Diary & Mood Tracker
description:
Introspect on daily events with self care journal to lead a happier life. We often find it
demanding to maintain a personal diary or mood journal and write about our
feelings. Yet, keeping our precious moments and memories safe for a lifetime is
what we aspire. Log your emotions and create a story anytime, anywhere using
Chiku ‚Äì Personal Diary & Daily Mood Tracker.

Emotion Tracker
Give some time to yourself, for your well-being. Taking out a few minutes daily from
your busy, stressful schedule and just wondering about how your day was, is the key
to a healthy mind. Think about what made you feel happy and why something did
not. Log your emotions in the happiness tracker or reason about why your daily life
has become so stressful. Chiku is your personal assistant and emotion tracker to help you keep track of your day-to-day activities and inspire you along the way to
keep making your life better.

Mental Health Journal
Find your mental health score. We rate your daily mood and feelings to generate a
score averaged over a period of time, that tells how well you are keeping. Stay
elevated, keep a high score. Also, have a look at your top feelings, moods and
activities over the last few days.

Read Quote Of The Day
Get a daily dose of quotations, challenges, and questions. Start your day by reading
quote of the day that motivate you to achieve great things in life and guide you to live
a more meaningful life. Take Challenges that spark a competitive spirit in you and
feel a sense of accomplishment when you fulfil them. Explore the self care journal to
answer questions that force you to rise above petty issues and ponder over more
important stuff in life.

Mood Journal and Mood Diary
Get in-app blogs and be a part of the mood diary community. Connect with others
like you anonymously through our Community Platform. Share what you feel on
various topics with mood journal discussions. We believe that it‚Äôs easier to face
challenges in life when we have someone to talk to and get support from like-minded
people.

Self-care journal is available in 6 languages: English, Hindi, French, German, Italian
and Spanish.


Features of Chiku ‚Äì Personal Diary & Daily Mood Tracker

‚òÖ Log your mood, feeling, activities and write about your day in mood journal.
‚òÖ Graphs & Interesting Insights to make mood diary more appealing
‚òÖ Configure reminders to create a story daily in self-care journal
‚òÖ Get a daily dose of motivation in the form of quotes, questions and challenges.
‚òÖ Increase your security by enabling emotion tracker app lock
‚òÖ Draw or add images and add them to your story
‚òÖ Use Happiness tracker to log your feelings
‚òÖ Read in app blogs and quote of the day about mental health
‚òÖ Join a community of like-minded people and mood journal keepers.
‚òÖ Multiple mood diary Themes to personalize your diary.
‚òÖ Dark mode available for mental health journal

Are you looking for a useful and life-changing self care journal app? 
The new emotion tracker and mental health journal is here for you. 

Download and use Chiku ‚Äì Personal Diary & Daily Mood Tracker today!

comments: I payed for a month just to try it out fully. It's a very pleasing app to use, the ui looks very elegant and it actually feels like Chiku is asking me questions rather than me just ranting onto the paper. The o ly complaints I have are that it's going to be a massive pain to scroll to old stories and I feel as though the daily reads (for me) aren't too useful. Really great app! I'm considering buying the lifetime plan hoping this app doesn't get discontinued.

Very nice app. It's more than an app. It's a safe spaceüåå. Meditation is very nice. The quotes are very good of course!! Im in love with this app. The themes are all so good. Writing here is so easy!! Love it.
Easiest app to use. It is enough options to declare all your feelings and mood conditions, also, if you want you can add a written description about what's going on.
This app is amazing. I love how it reminds you to add a new story every day. Idk how to explain but everything is perfect.

I'd like to visit my previous entries with more ease. Please let me view them more easily without having to scroll sideways a lot. Also a go-to feature where you can find specific entries besides the filter would help. Also it would be nice to be able to save community blogs and daily quotes that inspired you. Maybe save them somewhere so you can access them any time. I also have experienced difficulty downloading the pdf versions of my entries.

title: Vaginal Tightening and Rejuvenation Naturally
description:
As we age, we naturally lose some tone in all of our muscles due to a lowered production of collagen in the body and this can lead to vaginal laxity and loss of plumpness of the labia.

Many women also consider vaginal tightening after having children. During natural childbirth, the vaginal muscles expand to form the birth canal for your baby. After several children, or sometimes after having a large baby or a difficult delivery, your vaginal muscles can be left looser and weak and the surrounding tissues may be stretched and torn. Even after traditional treatments for the reduction of incontinence, such as pelvic floor exercises, the condition of your vaginal muscles and pelvic floor may not always improve.

Whilst we can offer traditional surgical vaginoplasty and labiaplasty, we do offer an effective alternative for those seeking a non-surgical solution. This app is a revolutionary vaginal rejuvenation and tightening treatment that is a completely safe, non-surgical alternative to traditional surgical vaginoplasty and labiaplasty. This app is able to provide complete vaginal rejuvenation both internally and externally, including labial remodeling and vaginal tightening. 

 Quick, amazing vaginal tightening effect! - Vaginal Tightening Stick is all made of 100% natural organic ingredients and helps you restore healthy.
This app will help you keeps clean, preventing vaginal from body wastes or paper residue and remove bad smell before and after periods

Upgraded Vaginal Tightening Rejuvenation with All Natural Herbal Blend, Vaginal Detox for Female Healthy Support, and Fast Result : How to Strengthen (Tighten) Vaginal Muscles
If you've had a baby, experience incontinence, or are trying to improve your making love life, strengthening your pelvic floor muscles can empower you. It's important to identify the correct pelvic floor muscles that wrap around your vagina so you can begin contracting and releasing them in a series of exercises known as Kegels or wall squats. With regular practice, you'll have more control over the muscles that surround your vagina.

Vaginal tightening. Yes, it is uncomfortable and awkward to even say these words. But be honest. 
Even though it shouldn't matter, this "issue" makes many women very anxious. They become less confident, doubt their own sexual prowess and most of all start to feel inadequate.

VAGINAL TIGHTENING: DO YOU REALLY NEED IT?

Most of us want to feel sexy and confident, especially when it comes to our performance in the bedroom. And for that purpose, most women feel that vaginal tightening is the perfect solution, especially after giving birth vaginally.

A tight vagina could heighten pleasure for both of you during making love. For men, it's the sensation of feeling those soft, cushiony walls gripping their penis. And for women, it's feeling every ridge of their man's penis inside them.

But when your vagina becomes 'loose' (and we'll talk about the reasons later), then perhaps making love might become a little less stimulating.

Vaginal Tightening Rejuvenation, Shrinking Vagina Care Feminine Repair for Female Healthy Support : Ways To Tighten Your Vagina Without Plastic Surgery 

When it comes to the vagina, there are a lot of myths and misconceptions. Some people, for example, believe that vaginas can lose their elasticity and become loose forever. That‚Äôs not actually true, though.

Your vagina is elastic. This means it can stretch to accommodate things coming in (think: a penis or sex toy) or going out (think: a baby). But it won‚Äôt take long for your vagina to snap back to its previous shape.

Your vagina may become slightly looser as you age or have children, but overall, the muscles expand and retract just like an accordion or a rubber band.

Keep reading to learn more about where this myth comes from, how a ‚Äútight‚Äù vagina may be a sign of an underlying condition, tips to strengthen your pelvic floor, and more.

title: GLOW. Ovulation & Period Tracker
description:
Get pregnant, log your period cycle and more. Discover all the ovulation, period, fertility and pregnancy information you need with Glow.

Log your period in the app‚Äôs calendar and track your cycle with our ovulation calculator. 

Your period tracker lets you record ovulation, PMS, and pregnancy symptoms. Or log your period and be in control of your fertility with our period tracker and ovulation calendar. 

Fertility made easy - 5 ways Glow can work for you:

1. Get pregnant easily - Log 40 different health signals from sexual activity, mood swings, PMS and more.
2. Period tracker and ovulation calendar! Get personalized period information with our cycle chart, ovulation tracker and period calculator.
3. Fertility FAQS - Want to learn more about charting your fertility, egg freezing and menstrual health? Our library of "Glow Scoops" has all the articles you need to stay informed.
4. PMS or other symptoms? Log them all on your period calendar and find out what they mean.

Join the largest online community for women who are trying to conceive. Or get your partner to join our mirror app because fertility is a team sport!

comments: Hahahahhaa. This update deleted five years of period data. Before that, I hated opening it. Glow has been having an identity crisis for years. They can't just concentrate on a few things. They have to have ALL THE THINGS. Every update added more stuff I don't use and moved the one tool I do use: tracking my period. Ecstatic to delete this now that I'm not relying on its data.

Swore by this app for years. It was my go to! We have been struggling with infertility for a very long time and I kept years of logs in glow. When I actually needed them, all my information was gone. All my cycle data, no period predictions, no log of my positive ovulation tests, nothing. I thought it would be easy to contact customer service, but it's not. I got one email back from customer service, that's it. It's been 3 days. Dont trust glow with your important information.

[edited for update] I created a bug to fix the issues I had and communication was poor. Very disappointed. I used Glow for cycle tracking and it helped me avoid pregnancy for a year naturally and then conceive on the first cycle, I loved it! But now that my period is back almost 2 years later, all the features are clunky and I'm constantly bombarded with ads. Logging is more difficult and seems buggy, specifically the app doesn't recognize that I'm on my period.

Been using this app for 7 years , every prediction is spot on. I do have a suggestion however, you guys should add a hysterectomy log to this app. Some have questions about it and some have had one and want to log to keep up with cm and other things. As things are once a woman have a hysterectomy there is no use for this app anymore. Just a suggestion. Otherwise fantastic app.

The app served its purpose, but... I'm absolutely over receiving so many daily progress emails about things that just aren't possible due covid-19. Talking about prenatal classes and how wonderful they're going to be (no, they won't be, they're all cancelled), or about baby showers, or whom you'd like to have as a support system during birth (no one is allowed in at my hospital) is just like a punch to the gut... wish you'd have changed these messages given the current state of the world.

title: Daylio - Diary, Journal, Mood Tracker
description:
Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your food log. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your wellbeing, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal. We build it on three principles:

‚úÖ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
‚úÖ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
‚úÖ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment‚Äîno learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use, create your first entry in two steps.

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. 


ü§î HOW DOES IT WORK

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep an old school diary. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the statistics on charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
‚≠ê Make reflection a daily habit
‚≠ê Discover what makes you happy
‚≠ê Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities 
‚≠ê Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis
‚≠ê Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly or yearly charts
‚≠ê Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity or group
‚≠ê Customize color themes
‚≠ê Enjoy nights with dark mode
‚≠ê See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels'
‚≠ê Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
‚≠ê Build habits and collect achievements
‚≠ê Share statistics with your friends
‚≠ê Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
‚≠ê Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
‚≠ê Turn on PIN lock and keep your diary safe
‚≠ê Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


üßê PRIVACY AND SECURITY

We are a top private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to the Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.
descriptionHTML:
Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your food log. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your wellbeing, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal. We build it on three principles:

‚úÖ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
‚úÖ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
‚úÖ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment‚Äîno learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use, create your first entry in two steps.

summary: Self-Care Bullet Journal with Goals - Mood Diary & Happiness Tracker
recentChanges: Thanks for using Daylio. We have made several small improvements and fixed a couple of bugs. Enjoy the app!
comments: Far more useful and life-improving than expected! I've been using daylio every single day for almost 2 years, which is both an achievement and a testament to the app's ease-of-use. It's still being actively developed so great new features keep popping up. An app that I'm very happy to support and recommend.

I bought the app, but when I switched my phone, they didn't saved my purchase, restricting me in use of the app. Although premium version still valid and working on the old phone. Ridiculous! Btw: asking monthly subscription for the app, for which you don't even need to pay for servers, is the most violent insult of your usersüñï

Great tool to help you keep track of life. I like the fact it works with speech to text so I don't actually have to type down my journal throughout the day and it helps keep track of things I want to do things I'd like to do and just things like that. it reminds me to do stuff a lot which honestly sometimes I would forget and it's honestly help me a lot with my depression by just reminding me to like be kind to myself and things like that. I highly recommend it.

I have struggles with remembering to do simple daily tasks and keeping a routine in place. This is the only app I pay for because its the easiest to use and the only one that's ever actually managed to keep me on task and keep track of things. I highly recommend it for anyone with executive dysfunction, ADHD or autism if you need help staying on task or remembering daily self care!!

Great mood and activity tracker. I would really like the ability to still log things after midnight as the same day. I am having to customise the time and date for late night entries because they don't make sense to include in the next day. I haven't started that day yet! I think a "day start/end time" we can set would be an easy fix, much like choosing if weeks start on Sunday or Monday. I hope you consider this feedback!
