title: Period Tracker
description:
Period Tracker is the easiest way to track your periods! 

* Press a button at the start of your period every month. Period Tracker logs your dates and calculates the average of your past 3 months' menstrual cycles to predict the start date of your next period. 
* View your current and future period dates, ovulation and fertile days, your moods and your symptoms in a simple month-view calendar. 
* Decorate your phone with an icon that looks great on your home screen and that's discreet. It reads simply "P Tracker." 

Period Tracker is FILLED WITH FEATURES. 
* Take daily notes of moods, symptoms, and intimacy. 
* Easily view the number of days until next period or number of days late. 
* Know when you're fertile with flowers that show on your homescreen during your predicted ovulation and eight day "fertile window." 

Please email comments and suggestions to support@gpapps.com.

Disclaimer: Period Tracker period and fertility forecasts may not be accurate and should not be used to prevent unwanted pregnancy.  To forecast ovulation Period Tracker calculates 14 days before the projected start date of one's next period.  Forecast accuracy depends on a number of factors including how regular one's cycle length is, when one actually ovulates during the cycle, and how many periods have been logged in the app.  Anxiety, stress, diet, nutrition, exercise, environment, medications, age and other factors can also affect one's cycle from month to month.  

By downloading this app you agree to the End User License Agreement at http://gpapps.com/support/eula/ .

summary: Period Tracker, the easiest way to track your periods!
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I love this app it tells me what day i should start and I've done that each time. My only issue was this last period lasted 13 days and i had to restart my period twice even tho I hadn't selected that my period had ended yet, there should be a way to fix that so you don't have to restart and make notes. My other thing was when you say you've been intimate you have 3 positions to choose from but it only let's you choose one, could you please fix that also? Other than that I've been very satisfied

Overall has been a hugely helpful app. My one beef is if I'm trying to remove the pregnancy setting and accidentally choose "miscarriage" as the reason I can't go back and fix it. There is no setting to remove the miscarriage note, which affects the app's ability to continue predicting my fertility cycle. I would like to be able to remove pregnancy notes, please and thank you.

I have this app with my partner, her app works well. My app runs in 'partner mode' and hasn't updated in a long time. According to my app she is 145 days late, as she is not 4 months pregnant I believe the app may be malfunctioning. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app, this has not helped. The settings button on the interface is unresponsive. Great idea for an app, poor final product.

I enjoy the free portion of the app but recently my widget has stopped working. I checked for and update but there isnt one. I have to delete the widget and replace it everyday to fix it and it defeats the purpose of me using the widget. The widget worked fine the first month or so. The app seems to keep everything together well and I would upgrade for the charts but I would prefer a cheaper subscription for just the charts only. Thanks for the app! I hope the widget issue is fixed soon.

This app helps a lot to keep track. I don't have to try to remember when I'm going to start, when my last menstrual started, helps when I'm going to ovulate and many other things. I would give 5 stars if the app was still completely free.

title: Water Drink Reminder
description:
Best of 2016 App, Top Trending App and Best Self-Improvement App selected by Google Play.

Water Drink Reminder reminds you to drink enough water. Proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.
Featured by Google Play! No.1 heath app over 30 countries, top 5 over 90 countries! The best water tracker app ever! Helps you stay hydrated.

GOOGLE PLAY AWARD: TOP DEVELOPER
The Water Drink Reminder now supports Google Fit

Do you drink enough water?
Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
Are you in good shape?
You need Water Drink Reminder - a water tracker app to help you develop good habits of water drinking!

This water tracker app reminds you to drink water every day to keep you hydrated.

Just enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Remember to update the app each time you drink a cup of water. Then the app will remind you when it's time for another drink. Hydration helper not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.

The benefits of drinking water:
* Stay in shape and keep fit; water is calorie free
* Clears up your skin
* Keeps your skin and nails healthy
* Helps prevent kidney stones
* Keeps you hydrated

Key Features include:
* Water tracker that will remind you when and how much water to drink throughout the day
* Customized cup and standard (oz) or metric (ml) units
* You can set your start and end time to drink water for each day
* Graph and logs of your schedule
* Syncs weight data with Google Fit.
* Syncs weight and drink water data with S Health.
* You can login through your Google account.
* You can backup and restore your drinking data through the water tracker.

In our day-to day life, drinking water regularly can be challenging, despite its numerous health benefits. This water tracker app makes it easier to stay hydrated. It may even help you lose weight and prevent certain illnesses.

Water Drink Reminder is a secure app. Please contact us if you have any security questions.

Water Drink Reminder Pro version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.northpark.drinkwaterpro&referrer=utm_source%3DWater_Free

recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Wonderful, wonderful app. Only two complaints that they might be working on fixing. One, it doesn't tell you how much you should be at currently, it just shows consumption, total, and then a little arrow at your current objective. Would be nice to see your current objective number of ounces. Second, the logging for type of drink is a little clunky. Would be nice to hold down the 'plus' button, and then drag my finger to the choice. I press the plus button all the time with the wrong drink.

An excellent app. Hypothetically my kidneys owe to this app. In the last 1.5 yrs, whatever water I drank, I can clearly attribute 80% of that success to this app. I forget drinking water. Even after working whole day and running 3 KMs later, I don't feel thirsty. Though I don't feel like drinking but my body clearly shows me that it is not happy by the color of waste that comes out. Since using this app, I have changed that. There is only so much an app can do. Rest is in our own hands.

It's an alright app. Does what it says on the tin. The thing is it says it shares your data with other sites for ads and promotions but you can turn that off if you want. I've tried turning it off 4 times but it doesn't work. You can click "I do not agree" but it just puts it back to agree. Can this be fixed?

Fantastic reminder! It's very simple and easy to use. I love that I can change the amount of ounces and the time that I need to be reminded. Very user-friendly! Since using this app has done a great job of keeping up with my intake of water as I begin the process of losing weight. If I have a headache I simply drink enough water in that headache goes away. It's kept me from being dehydrated. I love it!

I would love it, if it actually did it's job. It reminds me to drink water for about 2 days then just stops sending notifications all together. I have to open the app and add water for it to start reminding me again. But it inevitably stops after a day. I regret purchasing this app, and will look for another. Also, it does NOT allow me to add water from my watch.

‚Ä¢ Internet Not Required

Make potty training work for you and your kids. Keep track of potty training activities and get reminders with our handy potty training timer when your little one has to go.

‚Ä¢ Sat on the potty
‚Ä¢ Went to potty
   ‚Ä¢ Told Parents?

recentChanges:
¬∑ Bug fixes and improvements

¬∑ Potty Whiz, the best FREE Potty Training App.

comments: I was about to spend money and time printing & laminating yet another chart for my kids, but instead, I found this app which made things so much easier! My 2 year old was in school before quarantine & potty training well but we still needed help with consistency. This app had her excited to go from the first day of use and we are now on our 4th day in a row exclusively in big girl panties with very few accidents. The small $ was worth it to have other caregivers track progress too. We love it!

I think this app is really great. We are only on day one of training but the timer has been nice to have. I also like the tracking of if she does poop or pee and what times. I think it will be helpful to anticipate future potty trips.

It has all the basics...you can track input, output, attempts, and dry pants. The timer is fantastic! Very easy to use. I just wish there were more options for a reward screen for successes. I have the free version, but would upgrade if that were an option.

This app has been the best app out of all of them that my husband and I have downloaded. It's actually helped our son with potty training! We've never been as successful as we have been lately! He actually gets excited to go on the "poppy" because he knows if he does he will get the fireworks and stars that the app does after every potty!

My child loves the fireworks, which is a plus. But its an "either/or" app, which stinks because I dont want to mark individually of they were dry, sat, and/or peed, it takes too much time for our busy schedule. It'd be really nice if I could mark that they were both dry AND sat on the potty as the same 'activity'.

title: HelpToPee
description:
The sound of streaming water is perfect for helping a child to pee.

Previously, in order for the child to urinate, parents needed to make specific sounds or invent other ways. For example, water transfusion from one glass to another.
Now you have a program that calls the appropriate associations and desires.

An example plays an important role for the child, and in this case, the murmur of water for children creates the impression that someone is also urinate alongside.
 
Sometimes adults need help too. If you have problems with urination (for example, on a trip you want to use a public toilet, but can not pee), run this application, relax and you will certainly get the desired result!

title: Bearable - Symptoms & Mood tracker
description:
‚úÖ All health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your health professional can get the full picture.

‚úÖ Reclaim control over your well-being

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible to all. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.  

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

‚úÖ Gain useful insights with just a few clicks a day

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds, or go into more detail with an additional note. 
‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise your daily activities and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise and medication/supplements. 
‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities and health factors impact your mood and symptoms using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.
‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our neat health timeline, so that you can get the full picture. Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment - no need to struggle to remember a detailed health timeline for the last week or month.
‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶

‚ûï Set Reminders - Fully customise your reminders, whether it's a general reminder to make a diary entry or a reminder to take your medication and supplements. 
‚ûï Share and Export -  Export data securely to yourself or your health professional
‚ûï Automatic health data sync - You can choose to allow the app to automatically gather data such as Sleep and Steps taken from your phone.
‚ûï Dark mode - Change at night to a display easier on the eyes.
‚ûï Restore data across devices - Restore your data between Apple & Android devices.


üîê PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time.  It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with mental and physical health issues themselves.  With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.  Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most.  We are committed to continue improving upon this app that could help many people start to feel like they can reclaim control over their health.  If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them over to james@bearable.app.  We‚Äôd love to hear from you.

descriptionHTML:
‚úÖ All health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your health professional can get the full picture.

‚úÖ Reclaim control over your well-being

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible to all. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

‚úÖ Gain useful insights with just a few clicks a day

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds, or go into more detail with an additional note.
‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise your daily activities and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise and medication/supplements.
‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities and health factors impact your mood and symptoms using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.
‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our neat health timeline, so that you can get the full picture. Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment - no need to struggle to remember a detailed health timeline for the last week or month.
‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶

‚ûï Set Reminders - Fully customise your reminders, whether it's a general reminder to make a diary entry or a reminder to take your medication and supplements.
‚ûï Share and Export - Export data securely to yourself or your health professional
‚ûï Automatic health data sync - You can choose to allow the app to automatically gather data such as Sleep and Steps taken from your phone.
‚ûï Dark mode - Change at night to a display easier on the eyes.
‚ûï Restore data across devices - Restore your data between Apple & Android devices.


üîê PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time. It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with mental and physical health issues themselves. Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most. comments: This is absolutely the best of its kind. I have never seen such a comprehensive, customizable, well-designed app that serves as many functions as this one. I've already shown it to multiple friends/therapists. For those of you moaning about the cost... seriously, getting the subscription will set you back just over $2/month. I work professionally with highly impoverished individuals who do have to count every penny, but come on. Most people can shell out a couple bucks without harm.

The app lets you log your mood, any symptoms you are having, and a number of factors that you think may be affecting your mood/symptoms. The default categories to log are good, but you can add/remove/edit all of the categories to fit you better. It's super easy to fill out, even when I'm not feeling well. It (sometimes) feels like I'm logging meaningless information, but then when I click on the Insights tab, it shows me tons of relevant information about which factors are influencing my mood (or any other symptom I log!). Turns out listening to music and video chats work wonders for my mood--good to know! This is also a wonderful way to record how I'm feeling over time--it lets me easily decipher long-term changes in my wellbeing, which is great information to discuss with medical professionals.

I really like this app, it's easy to use and the design is nice and the ability to customize it to your needs is great. However, the syncing isn't very reliable. I have a phone and a tablet, and downloaded it on both, I tried to log in on the tablet, and only a few entries were visible. Later I went to look at the one on my phone, and half the entries are gone, and so are factors I added. I want to keep using this app, but if it's going to randomly forget things that's a problem.

I have tried multiple times in the past to find a way that I could easily log my moods in a way that felt nuanced and meaningful but also flexible and customizable, but this is the first app I have ever seen that got it right. For once, I am finding it convenient to do quick check ins and even monitor my food and water intake which I never thought I'd have the patience to do. You don't have to get premium, but it's well worth it at least to support a great app.

Brilliant App & well worth paying for. I wanted an app to record daily symptoms to enable me to give an accurate report to my GP. This app has everything I wanted & more. Being able to write notes by each symptom is so helpful & the insight reports are incredible. I did have a little snag when I first signed up for the free trial, but I made contact, explained the situation & James helped me to sort it all out. The app has been fantastic ever since. Thank you bearable team üôèüèªü•∞

title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
We‚Äôre here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for you to provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone, plus the up to 80% Special Off of subscription. We hope to help users to stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!

If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced‚Äîthere are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as ‚ÄúWorks with Google Fit‚Äù,‚ÄúTop Developer‚Äù,‚ÄúClear Your MindÔºå Engage Your Body‚Äù, ‚ÄúKeep Calm & Carry On‚Äù in Google Play, 
Voted as‚Äù Best Yoga App‚Äù of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the ‚Äú5 Addictive Fitness Apps‚Äù.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal‚Ä®
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don‚Äôt like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits¬†
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it!‚Ä®

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;
Contact:
Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.

comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. üò≠

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

title: Daybook - Diary, Journal, Note, Mood Tracker
description:
Daybook is a FREE, passcode-protected personal diary, journal and notes app available for Android. Daybook helps to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. It lets you organize your created diary/journal entries or notes from the past in the easiest way.

WHY USE DAYBOOK? 

‚Ä¢ SAFEGUARD MEMORIES: Daybook enables you to write a private diary, memoir, journals, and notes in the most natural way and record memories in an organized manner.

‚Ä¢  GUIDED JOURNAL:¬† Supports guided journal for tracking mood and activities, Mental Health Journal for managing stress and anxiety, Handwriting¬†Scanner, Gratitude journal, self-improvement, and more.

‚Ä¢  JOURNAL INSIGHTS:¬† Gather insights using mood analyzer from your activity log & mood log.

‚Ä¢ SECURE AND PASSCODE PROTECTED: Journal with lock helps to keep the diary private. Security Code allows keeping your entries private. Data stored in the app is securely protected with diary with lock. 

‚Ä¢ EASY-TO-USE: ¬†It's easy-to-use journaling, a routine daily tracker with superior diary/journal experience ‚Äî nothing confusing, nothing complicated- its simple diary for everyday daily writing. Just write and save a journal notebook! Simple diary Calendar view helps to navigate to a previously written lo easily.


‚Ä¢ FREE CONTENT STORAGE WITH AUTO DATA BACKUP: Content/photos included in the daily notes journal will be accessed from different devices and will back up to the cloud automatically. Never need to worry about losing the diary entries and thus safeguarding memories with the diary free app. Notepad diary daily routine included in the app will be accessed with just passcode later on.

‚Ä¢ SPEAK TO WRITE JOURNAL DIARY : Daybook Speech notes feature enable to record voice notes, creating a speech to text entries powered by AI.

‚Ä¢ MULTIPURPOSE USABILITY: Following are some of Daybook use cases.
- As an emotion tracker: Capture your feelings that reflect your emotional state, whether you are thankful, filled with gratitude, upset or depressed about something, maybe an illness. Daybook is there for you to rant about anything you wish to, to free your mind and thereby help you lead a quiet, serene life.
- As a to-do list app: Journal with pictures helps to organize ideas or thoughts to maximize productivity by making notes and lists instantly. 
- As a Business diary day planner: Create agendas, write memos, craft presentations as notes using daybook as a task manager app.
- As a Trip journal app: Seamlessly enable us to travel journals, including travel photos in an orderly manner. Camera capture enables us to take photos quickly in a simple journal.
- As a Daily expense tracker: Organize your receipts, bills, and invoices daily. Note and save!
- As a Class notebook: For educational purposes, use it as - ¬†homework tracker, Assignment Planner, simple notebook, a quick reference, creating quick notes with pictures
- As a wish list app: A Bullet journal aids note down wish list quickly. 
- As a pocket diary and a note keeper app: Record your life journey. Daybook is a life diary that works with multiple platforms such as Web, mobile, through voice Assistance.

Standout features:

- Sync entries across platforms such as Mobile, Web, Digital Assistance. 
- Voice-activated features using Alexa or Google Assistant


Upcoming integration:

We have planned to include the following features in upcoming updates for the daybook app.

- Daily Mood tracker for the diary
- Search based on tags or location
- Import journal entries Diaro (.zip), Evernote (.enex) and Day One for Share and backup


To know more, visit us at https://daybook.app.

Follow us on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/DayBook.diary/


Feedback:
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at daybook.diary@gmail.com

comments: Really Nice... and Cool Features... but for a Price I was excited to start using this app. There have been many times where I get ideas for art projects, and experience feelings that can only be described in the given moment. It's easy to add entries and do quick check-ins multiple times a day and I was psyched to see the other journaling ideas... Until I saw that you have to spend $30/year for those features. So cruel to ad them just to say, "Pay us! Minus that, I would give it 5 stars.

The app has more intelligent offer than I expected. First, it is a great interface to use on any devices, web, phone, tablet so I'm happy to be able to access it any time. The note is simply minimal and well organized. I'm surprised that there are actually promt checkins and guided templates for different topics for journaling. I'm using more than I intended.

So far so good very simple to use and the design and layout is appealing. Better than most I've tried recently. Option to upload multiple photos in one go rather than individually would be handy, and the ability to upload videos would be nice. Great experience so far though.

it is a really good app, ive only just started using it and is very good compared to other diarys and mood journals ive had in the past. it is good even without the subscription as you have access to the diary feature, mood board and everything. the only reason im giving 4 stars is because i feel that the mood board could be a bit more in depth that just, "pick a face, what activities made you feel this way, any other notes." i feel it needs a little more but it is a great app and i recomend it!

Pay to use... Listen, If you guy offer this for free with a very LIGHT ad presence so you can get paid for the work out into creating this app, fine. If you want to offer the option to pay like 1 or 2 dollars to get rid of the ads, fine. Even if you roll out new amazing content, I mean serious content that you can't find elsewhere, not fonts, themes, backgrounds, photo insertion or that simple bs. But telling me to pay over $5 monthly when I can buy a $1 notebook? No, that is money grubbing.

Not a fan!!
I find this game okay, I guess. It's just the ads that really ruin the experience for me. You get an ad every level, and each level takes less time than the ad you receive after.

title: Height Increase - Increase Height Workout, Taller
description:
Dreaming of becoming taller? 
Wanna increase height after 18? 
Wanna know how to improve height naturally? 
Do you want to look more attractive and boost your self-confidence? 

üëâYou can find all answers in this app! 

60% of height is determined by genes inherited from parents, however, 40% of that is affected by external factors, including nutrition, exercise and sleep.

Affected by genes, if parents are high, their children are likely to be high. So many people may concern, if parents are not high, can children have a chance to be taller? Yes. Height is also affected by other external factors besides genes. This science-based app provides effective height increase exercises, diet plans and height-increasing tips. You can maximize your height naturally at home and get a better body shape in 8 weeks! 

Increase Height for Everyone
- Male & Female 
- Adults & Kids 
- Before 18 years old & After 18 years old 

Increase Height Workout
- All height increase workouts are designed by professionals

title: Puppy Potty Log
description:
Your personal assistant for puppy potty training! Being a puppy parent is the most wonderful experience, except, housebreaking. The key to housetraining your puppy is a consistent schedule. Log your dog‚Äôs pees, poops and meals and Puppy Potty Log will use the data to create a custom housetraining schedule unique to your fur baby.



- Designs a potty training schedule for your puppy based on your inputs.
- Creates unique weekly and weekend schedules
- Sends personalized alerts to remind you before any poop, pee, or accident
- Tracks your puppy‚Äôs progress and lets you know what to expect as he grows
- First puppy FREE, additional $0.99
- Includes access to tips, tricks, and FAQ, at https://potty.app/
descriptionHTML:
Your personal assistant for puppy potty training! Being a puppy parent is the most wonderful experience, except, housebreaking. The key to housetraining your puppy is a consistent schedule. Log your dog‚Äôs pees, poops and meals and Puppy Potty Log will use the data to create a custom housetraining schedule unique to your fur baby.



- Designs a potty training schedule for your puppy based on your inputs.
- Creates unique weekly and weekend schedules
- Sends personalized alerts to remind you before any poop, pee, or accident

- Includes access to tips, tricks, and FAQ, at https://potty.app/
summary: Your housetraining hero!
recentChanges: Improved data loading.
comments: Really good app. It needs way more event options, like Fell Asleep, Woke Up, Played, Walked, Trained, Swam, Bathed, etc. But I totally love that events can be back-dated, because when my pup goes potty or has an accident, I'm more interested in using it as a training opportunity than reaching for my phone to press a button. Most of my clothes don't have pockets, so half the time when I'm taking him on walks I don't even have my phone with me.

At first I was too lazy to use this, but after a bad day of several accidents I started inputting the data. It was pretty easy actually...just whip out the phone (put the treats, clicker, and poop bags in your other pocket) and press one button! It gives you a good reference for your dog's patterns. Definitely a useful app! Edit: 2 wks later App has become more & more useful. The app (and consequently you) gets better at suggesting times and accidents. Definitely helped us!

Great tracker for housetraining (and beyond)! With an entire family taking turns with a puppy this is a GREAT app for tracking potty, pee, feeding, water, and accidents. It has greatly helped in training for frequent pee trips that happen from 90 to longer stretches of time. It even helped us establish a poop pattern twice a day, 12 hours apart. And with everyone posting feeding we can keep the puppy on a regular schedule. Our 18 week old puppy has us trained really well with this log!

What it's missing is a way to record when we take the dog out. I want to see if there's a pattern there, when she's peeing in the house vs when we take her out. Our log looks like all red exclamation marks even though we take her out a bazillion times a day, she refuses to pee outside. It's a little helpful knowing WHEN she pees (ALL DAY LONG) but would be way more helpful if it showed when we took her out too.

Intuitive, easy to use and a life (or carpet) saver. Given this app is completely free and doesn't even contain ads, I'm thoroughly impressed. I'm only using it as an approximate tracker to see how many and roughly when poops occur, but it has been pivotal in our pup's toilet training. Definitely recommend to anyone who takes their puppies wellbeing seriously.

title: Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker - Medisafe

comments: After a rocky start, I have finally figured out this app and it's almost perfect! Sometimes I run into issues when I experience a time change (for travel or daylight savings), and I would love an option to record a ketone measurement. Other than those, I'm so grateful that this app helps me keep track of my son's complicated medication schedule!

Honestly, this is a life saver! I was losing track of all the meds i was taking, missing out numerous doses and occasionally taking medication twice by accident! This app allows me to add all my medication (and give it an icon that actually looks like the tabley/inhaler/etc) and set up reminders for each day. The great thing is that if I'm in the middle of something and can't take my meds there and then, I can "snooze" the reminder to go off in 5/10/15+ minutes! Fantastic app :-)

This was a good app on my last phone but on my new phone it's very unreliable. Customer support sorted out my problems last time but now it's missing reminders again and I've changed nothing. It's happening every few days. I think the recent update killed it. I've never encountered a more troublesome app, ever! I'm now looking for another medication tracker as these problems seem to be more trouble than they're worth. EDIT: Rating lowered to 2 stars due to app breaking again after another bad update and customer support not responding for 17 days. I've resorted to using my bedside alarm clock and a paper note for guaranteed reminders. EDIT2: I did contact customer support. You choose to not respond. I'm not going to beg for help. Sort your app out. 20 people agree with me so far.

Reminds me when to take my meds and every week it lets me know how often I have missed them. If I miss my meds I am asked a multiple choice question of why. At the end of the week I am able to see why I miss my meds so I have insight on how to fix the situation. This app is better than I expected, although it could be a tad more user friendly.

I found a few glitches here and there but this app is very well done if you're somebody like me who has several serious medical conditions requiring medications at different times a day and you'd like to track on the effectiveness of such medication highly recommend this app. The designers and developers really did put the user in the driver's seat. There is still some work that could be done however I'm extremely impressed and I use this app every day multiple times a day. I love it.

title: Pee Pee Timer
description: A smart timer for potty training pets.  Automatically adjusts the next pee timer based on previous performance.  E.g. Good pee within target time, add 2 minutes to next timer.
descriptionHTML: A smart timer for potty training pets.  Automatically adjusts the next pee timer based on previous performance.  E.g. Good pee within target time, add 2 minutes to next timer.
summary: A smart timer for potty training pets.
recentChanges: Update feedback text.
comments: I love the premise, but in practice it doesn't serve my needs. If I forget to log a pee, there is no way to go back and enter it, I can only restart the timer from the point that I remembered. I think for some people this will serve them really well, but unfortunately I am uninstalling and just using an app that allows for back entries. I'll set my own timer.

I like that the timer reminds you it's potty time. However, there should be more options to choose from. For instance "sitting on potty" and whether or not "successful/unsuccessful". Also there should be a log keeping track of the unsuccessful and successful times. And the design really doesn't matter so much, but it would be more pleasant to view if some effort was put into it. Honestly I'm grateful but to help out other parents and myself as a parent, can you please update the app? Thanks.

My main hang up is not being able to customize the alert song. If there is a way I have not clue how to do it. Other than that it's working pretty good. The kids know when it goes off they have to sit on the potty.

I actually used this to potty train my kid üòÇ she is fully potty trained because of this app. This is the only app I could find with a timer so not only does it help potty train pups it also helps with children
Does exactly what it says, I'm so thankful I found this app. I'm very optimistic that with this app and some determination our little one will be potty trained in no time.

The only complaints are: - Not enough stretching at the beginning and end of the training. - The "full body challenge" essentially targets the upper body. Would have like a program for the whole body, 3-5 days a week! Good job guys (and girls)!

Great in home workout! I have gotten a few new phones since using this though, and my progress doesn't come with me. For instance, I did the 30 day challenge a while back, but when I get a new phone the last parts of that circuit are locked unless I do it all again. That's my only knock. Been using this for a long time and really happy with the compressed, useful workouts.

I used many apps but I have to admit that this is the best work out app. Can you imagine that I built a muscular body out of this app. No heavyweights needed, just a set of instructions and guidance to follow. The app is well designed, with work out plans, a section where you add your weight and calculate your BMI, and a full report given to you after every exercise. On top of this, there are no ads to bother you and you can even use it offline. In a nutshell, this is an awesome app!

Voice guided, no intrusive ads, what more can I ask for? If you're not a beginner and know the "theories" of working out, this is useful. I seriously doubt the "intermediate" chest workout could be done perfectly by even an "advanced" person, as the rest intervals are waaaay too low.

Tried doing the upper body and lower body routine 28 day challenge, and it was a great experience. The first 3 days all of my body was sore (haven't worked out in months). It targets certain parts of your body every day and gets more intense as days pass. Even has descriptions, gifs, and video examples in case there's confusion. I learned alot of different stretches and workouts to add to my own custom routine. And this was only 1 part of the app. Also the ads are so unintrusive!

comments: I used to love this app. It helped me get diagnosed with Endo after I read one of the helpful articles on irregular periods. Unfortunately, everything has been locked behind their premium membership paywall. All the helpful articles are gone, replaced only with endless prompts to buy their memberships. And so, I too must move on. I understand the need to make money, but for those of us who can't afford it, its merely the nail in the coffin.

I've been able to track my period, ovulation, and even my pregnancy...very useful app! Update: I still love the app and its content. However, it has been difficult trying to change my pregnancy info. I had to uninstall and reinstall the app and there were still some issues as the app tends to save prerecorded data. Also, I would love it if I could log personal notes and reminders. This can be done somewhat using the calender feature but only after that specific date has come or passed.

I've been using this app for over 2 years now and it was great back then. Ever since they upgraded and got premium the user experience has gone down so much. I just like to log and track things and it used to be so quick and easy but every 5 seconds now you get prompted with an 'upgrade to premium' 'look at this premium feature' to the point where it takes so long to just try to mark one thing. You have great content, but when I hit X on something I expect it to close and not keep popping up

Used to really like this app. All of the information was great! Now unfortunately you don't get anything but the tracker unless you pay. I am already paying through the nose for doctors visits and tests to try to get pregnant and unfortunately this just isn't an expense I can justify. I understand the "subscription" income is used to "improve" the app but I feel that myself and a few others would be happier to watch a few adds and still have access. The tracker is accurate most of the time.

ETA: I don't know how others are able to get an option to log menstrual cup use. I've been using it for months and haven't seen that. It's pretty disappointing I have been using My Calendar for a good few years, and it's alright. Flo is great. I love all the information available and actually enjoy the "chats" to learn more about my cycle and my body. I also love how pretty it is, lol. I will definitely recommend it to friends.

comments: It's really frustrating to look at the dial that tracks your fertility. Sometimes I want to look ahead to see when it will be at its peak or I know my husband and I got frisky on a certain day and I want to see what the likelihood of getting pregnant was. Also, now that I am pregnant (clearly the likelihood was pretty high) it would be great if I could pause the cycle tracking. I know there's another app for tracking pregnancy, but it would be great to not have a 9 month period cycle on Eve.

I changed to Eve because I was using Glow just to track my period these days but I'm a bit disappointed. The app looks nice icons and layout but it's a bit confusing (like where do I find my daily logs?!) and I feel like Eve is 80% locked unless you are a premium user ü•≤

I only use it to track my period/what cycle day I'm on and I've never had an issue with that part. What I would like to see an improvement in: 1.) Less gendered language throughout the app. Not everyone who has a period is a woman and/or likes being referred to as "lady" or "girl". 2.) Cut out the patronising, outdated and frankly gimmicky comments about my cycle. I would much rather have an informative, comprehensive look at it, which takes into account that not everyone is the same.
Sadly none of the moods and symptoms I logged in Glow apps is available in this app. Would consider switching, but don't want to loose all the data.

I use to really like this app. You could log everything and see all your stats. Now you have to pay to get most of that. Also the community use to be very supportive. Now it's negativity, hate, and women tearing women or men down. After seeing racism was accepted on this app I will now be deleting the app and won't be returning.

summary: Feeding, sleep, and diaper tracker for your little one:)
developerAddress: 203-119 Madison Ave S, Kitchener, ON N2G 3M4
comments: I absolutely LOVE this app I use it every single day, it's gotten to the point where if we're having a really busy day I definitely rely on the app to tell me when it's time for a bottle or diaper, I love that it gives you a timeline and that you can adjust and tweak everything down to the minute but also the app is very easy to navigate. Fantastic app and I've already recommended it to my other expecting mom friends!

just found this app and after some testing it seems very nice & super easy to use BUT with no ability to sync data between the two parents (or even two devices). I'm impressed with the "dad" setting but what's the use of it if it doesn't sync with the "mom" in order to know what's my next action, let's say? is this a paid option or.. am I blind? overall seems a well-designed and pretty easy to use, app!

Does exactly what I need: lets me easily log feeds as I'm doing them, including which breast I'm feeding from. Really helpful with the diapering as well- allows you to just log what's in the nappy (pee, poo or both) but with the option to add comments about the diapers as well. It's very simple to use and the summary displays are helpful for keeping track of what's happening. I'm a first time mum, and it helps keep my anxiety low to have an accurate record of what is going in and out!

So easy to use. Makes tracking a breeze especially when you're half asleep at 3am feeding. The edit feature is also great if you forget to log off. Love that you can add in photos and chart growth/ sleeping patterns. The only improvement I can think of would be a pause button when feeding. I highly recommend this free app!.

This app has been a life saver. As a mum to multiple children my mummy brain has kicked in and I can't remember when I last did anything or which side I last fed on. With this app I'm able to check in seconds when something was last done and its suprising how often I think its only been an hour and its actually been several hours. I'm also able to monitor his general health and it gives me peace of mind. Its a very well made app, very useful and simple enough to use. Thank you.

Thanks for using Journey! This update allows members to purchase "Lifetime Membership" to unlock the web, desktop & mobile apps forever.

comments: H meave been using this diary for a long time. It's excellent! But I'm finding many of the photos I added appear as duplicates. Very annoying having to delete and add them again. Why is this happening? It seems random. Can anyone explain why this is happening. Duplicate photos only appearing on my phone, the computer version is always perfect.

I was more of a pen and paper type, which I still do on occasion but I love the fact I can ad photos and that will autoadjust the location of my entry to match the photo so I can show and speak to the moment. I can also journal on my driving commute which is always where I'm unloading the days thoughts and feel inspired. It's so easy and will always be able to be found.

I tried to export the journal to a new email account; exportation is only supported with a premium account. So I signed up for a 7-day trial with auto-renewal in order to export my journal... but was unable to import the journal into the new email account. Now frustrated, I tried to turn off the auto-renewal so I wouldn't be charged for a functionality that didn't work. No dice. The link provided in the help desk was 404-ed, the link provided in the desktop app didn't work. In short, fraudulent.

I love this app. So nice that I can add pics, audios, videos, links to my entries. It's so personal and meaningful. I wish it hadn't deleted some of my videos though. They were working and now it shows the entry is empty. Overall, best app I've found.

At first I loved the app and made entries daily. Then all of sudden a question pops up in my head, "what if the developers reads these daily enteries". I never felt right since. I purchased the membership but I dont feel I have 100% privacy.

title: JEFIT Workout Tracker, Weight Lifting, Gym Log App
description:
Tracking workout training routines using JEFIT gym log is easy. Programs from bodybuilding, 3 day splits, 5x5 & strength plans to home exercises & body weight lifting.

‚òÖ Google Play Editor's Choice ‚òÖ Men‚Äôs Fitness - Best Fitness and Health Apps ‚òÖ USA Today - New year, new you

Over 8 million people use JEFIT to track their workouts and transform their bodies.

JEFIT, the number one workout tracking planner app, provides free fitness program database to help you stay fit, make progress and get the most out of your gym or home fitness sessions. From beginner programs like 5x5, 531, stronglifts, 3 or 4 day splits, starting strength to advanced bodybuilding, weightlifting, powerlifting or kettlebell routines to programs using bodyweight, limited space or specialized equipment, JEFIT is the only workout app you need.

descriptionHTML:
Tracking workout training routines using JEFIT gym log is easy. Programs from bodybuilding, 3 day splits, 5x5 & strength plans to home exercises & body weight lifting.

‚òÖ Google Play Editor's Choice ‚òÖ Men‚Äôs Fitness - Best Fitness and Health Apps ‚òÖ USA Today - New year, new you

Over 8 million people use JEFIT to track their workouts and transform their bodies.

JEFIT, the number one workout tracking planner app, provides free fitness program database to help you stay fit, make progress and get the most out of your gym or home fitness sessions. From beginner programs like 5x5, 531, stronglifts, 3 or 4 day splits, starting strength to advanced bodybuilding, weightlifting, powerlifting or kettlebell routines to programs using bodyweight, limited space or specialized equipment, JEFIT is the only workout app you need.

Who is this app for?
If you‚Äôve logged your workouts in a journal, planner or just love training at the gym on your own schedule, JEFIT will help you reach your strength, weight and fat loss, and training goals from beginners to advanced lifters. We‚Äôve made the app to motivate you by rewarding you for consistency, pushing yourself to new personal records and committing to challenges with the community.

Top Features
‚óè Web or App - Track with the app and edit routines on our web app.
‚óè Track Workouts - Set your exercises, track weights and reps and we‚Äôll show you the results of your training
‚óè Exercise Instruction Database - Over 1300+ demonstrations and variations with HD video from experts
‚óè Intuitive Tools - a Swiss army knife for training tools, including rest timer, superset, interval timer, body measurements system, and most importantly, workout routine planner.
‚óè Training Programs - Customized workout programs made for 3, 4 or 5 day splits, fat loss, stronglifts, 5x5, starting strength, bodybuilding, 531, weightlifting, powerlifting, GZCLP, Greyskull, or build your own
‚óè Stay Motivated - Join our monthly fitness challenge with cash prizes and get support from other gym goers in the community. Also add your gym buddies to compare routines and lifts so you can reach your goal of improving strength, getting lean, toned or just staying active
‚óè Set Goals - Want to lose weight, get lean, get stronger or exercise consistently? You can build that in JEFIT‚Äôs custom journal
‚óè Add Friends - Find new fitness buddies in our community. Whether it‚Äôs someone to spot you at the gym or to compare bodybuilding tips.

comments: Used this apps for a couple of years and the latest updates are a backward step. The UI no longer displays the interval time but been replaced with an incremental number for those who can't count sets. I use to enter the weight for my next set during the interval however the keyboard won't appear while the interval timer is on. Also none of the graphics for the exercises display anymore which has caused me confusion. I hope the latest updates are reconsidered

Been using this app since the early days. I love the ongoing support but it wouldnt hurt for devs to stick to one UI and stop moving things around every other update. The latest update to intervals is just lazy. The timer auto-starts even if you dont want/need it and is always logged. A better approach would be to disable the time+logging if interval is set to 0, otherwise there is a x second delay before timer starts. Also the ability to set the main page under excerise history would be great.

Nice app an community. There must be a bug with the points earned: with the latest versions my sessions are not counted anylonger (and I do train every day almost...) Would be nice to get it resolved (I am in the contest, and it gives motivation ;) Overall, is a very good develooment, kudos to the team.

It's a good app, but it can be hard to use. I also couldn't find a way to contact them from the app and I feel like if you're going to charge people money you have to put a way to contact you if they have a problem or question. My husband just wants to know if there is a weekly report for reps like the other stats, but it makes me nervous that if something goes wrong I can't find a way to contact them about it.

Great app!!! Have been using for years. Really enjoy the improvements made over the years. Unfortunately, body stats page/functions have been very buggy and don't even work the last few updates. Weight doesn't record. Graph has goal weight posted way off in future. Weight no longer sync's w Google Fit. Could be 5star app. -2stars until fixed.

comments: I love this little game. Its fun, fast paced as you want it to be, just challenging enough to be enjoyable. The graphics are super cute. I would definitely recommend to a friend! Super fun! Played 50 rounds the first day. Sound effects a cross between Goofy and The Rock. Good for what ails you if you are (like me) about to barf from all the politics stuff!! Try it; YOU WILL LIKE IT!!

I really enjoy this game. It has zero annoying ads. You do have an ad opportunity, but you gain something from watching it and it's not forced on you. Now that's how ads should be. The game is a good diversion without becoming frustrating. Update 10/23/20 - All morning, I've been getting "You must connect to server" messages. I'm already connected. If I go to the chat and back, it connects. This is a nuisance. I often can't gain credit for the tournament points I've earned.

I have been playing this game for well over a year now. Almost to level 1500. I have NEVER spent one cent. Yes some levels are harder and it takes multiple times to beat it. But they are all beatable. It doesnt have constant ads or pressures to buy extra stuff. If you want it to be easy and spend your money by all means go ahead. Or just be patient and its free to all. Great job guys!! 5 stars!!

I've enjoyed the game so far. I like that there are easier levels and more challenging ones. I also love the unlimited life time that gets handed out, but I do have a suggestion. Why not make that bankable like coins and the boosters? I can't always play for an hour or more, but I don't want the unlimited lives to go to waste just because it's not a good time to play. It would be great to be able to select an increment of time for unlimited lives from your bank. Otherwise, great game.

LOVE THE GAME! However, after the latest update the app becomes soooo laggy. From splash screen to the home screen takes almost 10 minutes. Sometimes when you move to the next level it takes almost 3 minutes to play again. I hope the devs will fix it asap. This is the only game app that love so much.

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* ‚ÄúI‚Äôm generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‚ÄòConcentrate on your body‚Äô‚Äù - New York Times

* ‚ÄúIn the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses‚Äù - Mashable

* ‚ÄúEliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal‚Äù - Tech Republic

* ‚ÄúFound myself similarly refreshed afterwards‚Äù - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

recentChanges: Thanks for using Calm! This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: Toilet Time - Boredom killer games to play
description:
Toilet time means toilet games. Sometimes it‚Äôs soft and just a quick game, sometimes it‚Äôs hard, and it drags your bathroom game for a while. But now it can be a funny game every time, because consistency is important when nature calls you to toilet games full of minigames!

Fill your bathroom game sessions with thrilling minigames that will make you enjoy the toilet games for a long time and turn your restroom breaks into spectacular toilet games parties!

All the minigames within this bathroom game are an absolute necessity! Take a peek of all the quick games available:

- Don‚Äôt drop the soap: in this thematic toilet games, tap the soap to avoid letting it fall on the floor!
- Cover the seat: drag the toilet paper pieces to cover the toilet seat so you can enjoy your toilet games in peace!
-  Squish the flies: tap the flies to kill them, avoiding the yucky bug that may have landed in another person's toilet games!
- Something in my teeth: a quick game where you need to remove the food stuck in the teeth by dragging it on the opposite direction
- Trim the beard: trim the man‚Äôs beard without scratching his face. 
- Diaper throw: tap the screen to throw the dirty diaper inside the trash bin. Is your aim ready for this specific toilet games?
- The wrong tile: find the different tiling on the wall in this bathroom game!
- Golden Fish: guide the poor pet fish out of this toilet game by setting the plumbing straight
- Crowded toilet: count how many people left their mark in this toilet game
- Finish it: a quick game where you need to evacuate the meeting to finish your business
- Erasing: clean up the graffiti in this bathroom game
- Sticky toilet paper: save the bride from public shaming and remove the toilet paper stuck on her shoes. Nobody needs to know that she was also playing toilet games.
- Cockroach: tap on the screen and kill the yucky cockroaches that come out of the drain where someone flushed what‚Äôs left of their toilet games;
- Vacant: find a vacant cabin to use and finish your toilet games in peace
- Temperature: a funny game where you need to regulate the temperature of the shower
- Accident: save objects from the horrible fate of plunging into the toilet in this funny game
- Tubes: avoid the smelly toilets wrecked by the way too many tacos!
- Toilet Paper: all you have to do in this funny game is unroll the entire toilet paper roll
- Cleaning: quick game to clean the dirt from the toilet
- Sort: help men and women find the right restroom

Don‚Äôt let anyone tell you that a funny game and toilets can be enjoyed at the same time. Thematics minigames are definitely not a waste of time! After all, by playing these minigames, you‚Äôll earn keys to unlock pivotal pieces of history in the Toilet Museum, such as the fabled Egyptian toilet and the complex Time Machine Toilet!

title: Among Us
description:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship. 

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
descriptionHTML:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship.

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
summary: Join your crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal!
recentChanges: * Add support for 6 digit room codes.
comments: This is a very fun and addicting game, I love all of the features but I would recommend to add some features like:- 1. Creating an account and having the same name, but you can change it anytime you want, so by having an account we can add friends. 2. Add a voice feature for more fun, but still the chat feature should be there for people uncomfortable to talk. 3. Changing the amount of impostors and changing the map while being in the lobby as people misclick usually. I hope you can add this.

Great game. Has clearly grown in popularity since lockdown: almost everyone i know is playing it! I have a few improvements though that may make the game more enjoyable for people (like me) who cant spend money in games. One thing i would suggest is adding 'achievements', so that players can unlock some pets, skins, etc. Of course, you could also buy them with real money, but this gives people a chance to earn them instead of buying them. Also, seasonal kill animations would be cool. (Xmas, etc)

I honestly didn't get the point of it all, until I played it. The game is great! And as an app is even better! Getting used to the controls takes a bit of time, but it's surprisingly user friendly. My only problem so far has been with the keyboard (it blocks the entire screen and is really slow, but only ingame) and how other apps, specifically Messenger, can't display over it.

Very fun and addictive game!! However there are a few bugs and tips I could give. For me there is a glitch as the imposter where someone will report a body or call a meeting, but, I will hear the chat going off but im still playing the game, and everyone is frozen. Idk if that has happend to anyone else but if you could fix that that would be great! And also being a ghost is kind of boring. If you could give the ghost some extra things to do that would also be great. Other that that great game!

The game is amazing. Love the simplicity of the game, very enjoyable when playing with friends. Which brings up the topic of a friend system, sometimes it's hard to gather close friends. You can often meet some great people in lobbies, but the only problem is you cannot add them to play in the future which is a shame because this can definitely keep the community growing/make players stay. Love the game none the less. (Also hoping to see more add ons/maps in the future!!)

title: Operate Now: Hospital - Surgery Simulator Game
description:
Operate Now is the most realistic surgery simulation game. Operate patients like a surgeon and build your own hospital from scratch. 

Fan of surgery simulator and life simulation? Perform realistic surgeries on patients! Start to build and manage your own hospital and operate and rescue patients.
Hurry, Doctor! You‚Äôre needed at the hospital, on the double! Your dedicated medical team is depending on you to manage them, improve their facilities, and even perform important surgeries that could determine whether a patient lives or dies!

These are just a few of the thrilling things you‚Äôll get to experience in Operate Now: Hospital, which has been downloaded over 20 million times by players all around the globe. They love the intense surgeries and exciting melodramas that have helped make it one of the most realistic and popular medical simulation games of all time. Are you ready to take on all the challenges that are waiting for you while you attempt to build a world-renowned medical center? 

HERE‚ÄôS THE FEATURES, DOCTOR !

‚òÖ Build, upgrade, and continually improve multiple hospitals and their facilities.
‚òÖ Fan of surgery ? Operate your patients!
‚òÖ Monitor your staff, hospitals, and more on the world map.
‚òÖ Help your patients by performing incredibly realistic surgeries.
‚òÖ Exchange duplicate staff members with the new CV feature.
‚òÖ Keep your progress up-to-date with the new Facebook save feature. 
‚òÖ Speed things up with the builder, a useful tool that will kick your construction projects into overdrive. 
 

BUILD YOUR DREAM HOSPITAL
Ready to create your own clinic? Building and managing several hospitals isn‚Äôt easy. You‚Äôll need to be a like a tycoon to construct and oversee vital departments like emergency rooms, intensive care units, and many more. You‚Äôll also have to hire talented staff like skilled surgeons in order to help your patients and create a truly impressive medical center in the process.

PERFORM REALISTIC SURGERIES
Even if you can‚Äôt tell the difference between a bone fracture and a tracheostomy, you‚Äôll definitely enjoy Operate Now: Hospital‚Äôs realistic surgery engine. In this game, you not only manage hospitals, you work as a surgeon in them as well. You‚Äôll get to fix broken bones, help people injured during disasters, and much more. Manipulate surgical tools to cure patients. You‚Äôll need steady hands to make flawless incisions while you carefully operate on your patients. So it‚Äôs time to throw on your scrubs and head down to the ER! What about doing some surgery now?

EXPERIENCE BREATHTAKING DRAMAS
Operate Now: Hospital features dramatic storylines much like the ones in your favorite medical show on TV. You‚Äôll get to work alongside staff members like Dr. Amy Clarke and learn more about their crazy lives both in the hospitals and outside them. You‚Äôll get to experience lots of drama firsthand in Seasons 1 and 2 while you learn more about all the intrigue surrounding the hospitals, their patients, and their staff as well. 

Just like in a real medical center, there‚Äôs never a dull moment in Operate Now: Hospital. So step through its doors when you‚Äôre ready, Doc, and prepare yourself for riveting medical adventures that you‚Äôll never forget! 
Have you played the old Operate Now games as a kid ? Let us know your best memories!

http://www.operatenow.com
https://www.instagram.com/operatenowhospital
descriptionHTML:
Operate Now is the most realistic surgery simulation game. Operate patients like a surgeon and build your own hospital from scratch.

Fan of surgery simulator and life simulation? Perform realistic surgeries on patients! Start to build and manage your own hospital and operate and rescue patients.
Hurry, Doctor! You‚Äôre needed at the hospital, on the double! Your dedicated medical team is depending on you to manage them, improve their facilities, and even perform important surgeries that could determine whether a patient lives or dies!

These are just a few of the thrilling things you‚Äôll get to experience in Operate Now: Hospital, which has been downloaded over 20 million times by players all around the globe. They love the intense surgeries and exciting melodramas that have helped make it one of the most realistic and popular medical simulation games of all time. Are you ready to take on all the challenges that are waiting for you while you attempt to build a world-renowned medical center?

HERE‚ÄôS THE FEATURES, DOCTOR !


‚òÖ Build, upgrade, and continually improve multiple hospitals and their facilities.
‚òÖ Fan of surgery ? Operate your patients!
‚òÖ Monitor your staff, hospitals, and more on the world map.
‚òÖ Help your patients by performing incredibly realistic surgeries.
‚òÖ Exchange duplicate staff members with the new CV feature.
‚òÖ Keep your progress up-to-date with the new Facebook save feature.
‚òÖ Speed things up with the builder, a useful tool that will kick your construction projects into overdrive.



BUILD YOUR DREAM HOSPITAL
Ready to create your own clinic? Building and managing several hospitals isn‚Äôt easy. You‚Äôll need to be a like a tycoon to construct and oversee vital departments like emergency rooms, intensive care units, and many more. You‚Äôll also have to hire talented staff like skilled surgeons in order to help your patients and create a truly impressive medical center in the process.

PERFORM REALISTIC SURGERIES
Even if you can‚Äôt tell the difference between a bone fracture and a tracheostomy, you‚Äôll definitely enjoy Operate Now: Hospital‚Äôs realistic surgery engine. In this game, you not only manage hospitals, you work as a surgeon in them as well. You‚Äôll get to fix broken bones, help people injured during disasters, and much more. Manipulate surgical tools to cure patients. You‚Äôll need steady hands to make flawless incisions while you carefully operate on your patients. So it‚Äôs time to throw on your scrubs and head down to the ER! What about doing some surgery now?

EXPERIENCE BREATHTAKING DRAMAS
Operate Now: Hospital features dramatic storylines much like the ones in your favorite medical show on TV. You‚Äôll get to work alongside staff members like Dr. Amy Clarke and learn more about their crazy lives both in the hospitals and outside them. You‚Äôll get to experience lots of drama firsthand in Seasons 1 and 2 while you learn more about all the intrigue surrounding the hospitals, their patients, and their staff as well.

Just like in a real medical center, there‚Äôs never a dull moment in Operate Now: Hospital. So step through its doors when you‚Äôre ready, Doc, and prepare yourself for riveting medical adventures that you‚Äôll never forget!
